trans: Mode is the most frequently occurring value in a set of data.

sentences.english: the most efficient mode of transport
sentences.chinese: 最高效的运输方式

sentences.english: Set the monitor to 256 colour mode.
sentences.chinese: 把显示器调成256色彩模式。

detailed_translations.english: a particular way or style of behaving, living or doing something

name: mud
trans: Mud is a mixture of water and soil or fine-grained sediment that can be soft and sticky when wet.

sentences.english: They daubed mud all over themselves.
sentences.chinese: 他们用泥涂满全身。

sentences.english: I dirty my trousers when I step on the mud.
sentences.chinese: 我一脚擩在烂泥里， 把裤子弄脏了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 泥；诽谤的话；无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: wet earth that has become soft and sticky

name: orange
trans: Orange is a fruit with a tough reddish-yellow rind and a juicy, sweet pulp.

sentences.english: orange juice
sentences.chinese: 橙汁

sentences.english: orange peel
sentences.chinese: 橙子皮

sentences.english: Peel the oranges and divide them into segments.
sentences.chinese: 把橙子去皮，然后切成片。

sentences.english: orange groves (= where orange trees grow )
sentences.chinese: 柑橘园

detailed_translations.english: a round fruit that has a thick orange skin and is divided into parts inside

name: poetry
trans: Poetry is a form of literature that uses aesthetic and rhythmic qualities of language, such as meter and rhyme, to evoke emotion and convey meaning.

sentences.english: He reads a lot of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 他大量阅读诗歌。

sentences.english: a poetry magazine
sentences.chinese: 诗歌杂志

detailed_translations.english: poems in general, or the art of writing them

name: police
trans: Police are a group of people responsible for maintaining law and order, preventing crime and protecting people and property.

sentences.english: Police surrounded the courthouse.
sentences.chinese: 警察围在法院大楼四周。

sentences.english: Quick! Call the police!
sentences.chinese: 快报警！

detailed_translations.english: the people who work for an official organization whose job is to catch criminals and make sure that people obey the law

name: possibility
trans: Possibility is the condition or fact of being possible; something that may or may not occur or be true.

sentences.english: There were several possibilities open to each manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 每个制造商都可以有几种不同的选择。

detailed_translations.english: A possibility is one of several different things that could be done.

name: procedure
trans: Procedure is a series of actions taken in a particular order to accomplish a specific task or goal.

sentences.english: On board, we were given the usual talk on safety procedures (= what to do if an accident happens, or to prevent an accident ) .
sentences.chinese: 在飞机上，我们听了例行的飞行安全讲解。

detailed_translations.english: a way of doing something, especially the correct or usual way

name: queen
trans: Queen is a female ruler of an independent state, or the wife or widow of a king.

sentences.english: Queen Elizabeth
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白女王

sentences.english: the future queen
sentences.chinese: 未来的王后

sentences.english: the queen of diamonds
sentences.chinese: 方块Q，方块王后

detailed_translations.english: the female ruler of a country

name: ratio
trans: Ratio is the quantitative relation between two amounts showing the number of times one value contains or is contained within the other.

sentences.english: Yeah, , now you know how the sex ratio matters!
sentences.chinese: 是的，现在你知道性别比例的问题了吧！ ！

sentences.english: The ratio could reach one in four within a year.
sentences.chinese: 一年之内这个比例可以达到四分之一。

sentences.english: When using profiling it is typical to consider only the ratio (or percentage) of time spent in certain areas.
sentences.chinese: 当使用分析时，它是典型的考虑时间花费在某些领域的比例（或百分比）。

detailed_translations.english: a relationship between two amounts, represented by a pair of numbers showing how much bigger one amount is than the other

name: relation
trans: Relation is the way in which two or more things are connected or the way in which one thing is dependent on another.

sentences.english: diplomatic/international/foreign relations
sentences.chinese: 外交 / 国际 / 对外关系

sentences.english: a close/near/distant relation of mine
sentences.chinese: 我的一位近亲 / 远亲

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people, groups or countries behave towards each other or deal with each other

name: restaurant
trans: Restaurant is a place where people can order and eat meals prepared by professional chefs.

sentences.english: He took her out for a five-course dinner in a fancy restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 他带她到一家豪华餐厅吃了一顿有五道菜的晚餐。

sentences.english: The company runs a chain of restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 公司经营连锁饭店。

sentences.english: A new restaurant has just opened across the road.
sentences.chinese: 马路对面刚开了一家新饭馆。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can buy and eat a meal

name: satisfaction
trans: Satisfaction is the feeling of pleasure or contentment that comes from fulfilling a desire or need.

sentences.english: She got great satisfaction from helping people to learn.
sentences.chinese: 她在帮助人们学习的过程中得到很大的满足。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of happiness or pleasure because you have achieved something or got what you wanted

name: sector
trans: Sector is a part or division of an area or sphere, especially of business, society, or the economy.

sentences.english: ...the nation's manufacturing sector.
sentences.chinese: …该国的制造部门。

detailed_translations.english: a part of an area of activity, especially of business, trade etc

name: signature
trans: Signature is a person's name written in a distinctive way as a form of identification, authorization, or approval.

sentences.english: Her signature is totally illegible (= cannot be read ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的签字完全无法辨认。

sentences.english: The school collected 4,000 signatures for the petition.
sentences.chinese: 学校为这份请愿书收集到了四千个签名。

sentences.english: The Ukrainians put their signatures to the Lisbon Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰签署了《里斯本协议》。

sentences.english: Someone’s forged my signature (= made an illegal copy of my name to deceive people ) on this letter.
sentences.chinese: 有人在这封信中伪造了我的签名。

sentences.english: Each child must obtain the signature of his or her parents.
sentences.chinese: 每个小孩都必须得到父母的签字。

detailed_translations.english: your name written in the way you usually write it, for example at the end of a letter, or on a cheque etc, to show that you have written it

name: significance
trans: Significance is the quality of being worthy of attention; importance.

sentences.english: a decision of major political significance
sentences.chinese: 具有重大政治意义的决定

detailed_translations.english: the importance of sth, especially when this has an effect on what happens in the future

name: song
trans: Song is a musical composition consisting of lyrics and a melody typically for voice with accompaniment.

sentences.english: We used to listen to pop songs on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我们以前常常听收音机里播放的流行歌曲。

sentences.english: They sat round with guitars, singing folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他们弹着吉他围坐在一起唱民歌。

sentences.english: ...dance, music, mime, and song.
sentences.chinese: …舞蹈、音乐、哑剧和歌唱。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of music with words that you sing

name: tooth
trans: Tooth is a hard bony structure in the jaws of most vertebrates used for biting and chewing food.

sentences.english: Sugar is bad for your teeth.
sentences.chinese: 糖对牙齿不好。

detailed_translations.english: one of the hard white objects in your mouth that you use to bite and eat food

name: town
trans: A town is a place where people live and work, which is smaller than a city.

sentences.english: an industrial town in the Midlands
sentences.chinese: 英格兰中部的一座工业城镇

sentences.english: I walked to the nearest town.
sentences.chinese: 我走到最近的镇上。

detailed_translations.english: a large area with houses, shops, offices etc where people live and work, that is smaller than a city and larger than a village

name: vehicle
trans: A vehicle is a machine designed to transport people or goods.

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

name: volume
trans: Volume is the amount of space that a substance or object occupies, or the degree of loudness of a sound.

sentences.english: Can you turn the volume up?
sentences.chinese: 请你把音量调大好吗？

sentences.english: The volume of the container measures 10,000 cubic metres.
sentences.chinese: 这个容器的容量是1万立方米。

sentences.english: The period from 1940 – 1945 is in volume 9.
sentences.chinese: 1940年至1945年这段时间在第9卷。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of sound produced by a television, radio etc

name: wife
trans: A wife is a married woman considered in relation to her spouse.

sentences.english: Have you met my wife?
sentences.chinese: 你见过我的妻子吗？

sentences.english: a refuge for battered wives
sentences.chinese: 受虐待妻子庇护所

sentences.english: his second wife
sentences.chinese: 他的第二任妻子

detailed_translations.english: the woman that a man is married to

name: accident
trans: An accident is an unexpected and unintentional event, often resulting in damage or injury.

sentences.english: Ken had an accident at work and had to go to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 肯在工作中出了事故，不得不去医院。

sentences.english: I had a slight accident with your coffee.
sentences.chinese: 出了个小小的意外，我把你的咖啡弄洒了。

sentences.english: a train accident
sentences.chinese: 火车事故

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which someone is injured or something is damaged without anyone intending them to be

name: airport
trans: An airport is a place where airplanes take off and land, and where passengers can board and leave planes.

sentences.english: The plane landed at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.chinese: 飞机降落在希思罗机场。

sentences.english: Her family went to see her off at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 她的家人去机场送她。

detailed_translations.english: a place where planes take off and land, with buildings for passengers to wait in

name: appointment
trans: An appointment is a prearranged meeting or arrangement to see someone or be somewhere at a particular time.

sentences.english: All consultations are by appointment only.
sentences.chinese: 就诊必须预约。

sentences.english: Other changes included the appointment of a new Foreign Minister.
sentences.chinese: 其他变动包括任命了一位新的外交部长。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement for a meeting at an agreed time and place, for a particular purpose

name: arrival
trans: Arrival is the act of reaching a destination or the time at which someone or something arrives.

sentences.english: Only the timely arrival of the police prevented the situation from becoming worse.
sentences.chinese: 警方及时赶到才阻止了事态恶化。

sentences.english: Traffic problems account for one third of late arrivals.
sentences.chinese: 迟到的人有三分之一是因为交通问题。

sentences.english: The first arrivals at the concert got the best seats.
sentences.chinese: 最早来到音乐会的人坐上了最好的座位。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something arrives somewhere

name: assumption
trans: An assumption is a belief or something taken for granted, often without proof or evidence.

sentences.english: You would be making an assumption that's not based on any fact that you could report.
sentences.chinese: 你会做出不以你能报道的任何事实为依据的一种假设。

detailed_translations.english: something that you think is true although you have no definite proof

name: baseball
trans: Baseball is a sport played with a ball and bat between two teams of nine players each, in which the players score points by hitting the ball and running around four bases in a diamond-shaped field.

sentences.english: Yes, I like basketball and baseball.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我喜欢篮球和棒球。

sentences.english: Do you like baseball?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢打棒球吗?。

sentences.english: That man over there used to be one of the best players in baseball .
sentences.chinese: 这句话的意思是：那边那个人以前是最好的棒球运动员之一。

detailed_translations.english: an outdoor game between two teams of nine players, in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running around four  base s

name: chapter
trans: A chapter is a part or section of a book, typically with a number or title.

sentences.english: Read Chapter 11 as your homework.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是阅读第 11 章。

sentences.english: This chapter discusses power, and how people use it.
sentences.chinese: 这一章节讲权力，以及人们如何运用权力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts into which a book is divided

name: committee
trans: A committee is a group of people appointed or elected to consider or take action on a particular issue or matter.

sentences.english: a committee meeting
sentences.chinese: 委员会会议

detailed_translations.english: a group of people chosen to do a particular job, make decisions etc

name: conversation
trans: A conversation is a talk between two or more people, typically an informal one.

sentences.english: a telephone conversation
sentences.chinese: 电话交谈

sentences.english: Children quickly get bored by adult conversation.
sentences.chinese: 儿童对成年人的谈话很快就会厌倦。

sentences.english: They had a short conversation in German and seemed to be disagreeing about something.
sentences.chinese: 他们用德语说了一会儿，好像对什么事有分歧。

sentences.english: It’s impossible to carry on a conversation with all this noise in the background.
sentences.chinese: 在这么喧闹的环境中进行谈话是不可能的。

sentences.english: ‘Did you have a good journey?’ he said, trying to make conversation .
sentences.chinese: “你旅途愉快吗？”他问道，试图找话谈。

sentences.english: He was silent, no matter how hard Sofia tried to engage him in conversation .
sentences.chinese: 无论索菲娅怎么引他说话，他就是一声不吭。

sentences.english: After a while, the conversation turned to a friend’s coming wedding.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，话题就转到一个朋友即将举行的婚礼上去了。

sentences.english: They were deep in conversation , relaxed and smiling.
sentences.chinese: 他们谈得很投入，很放松，脸上带着微笑。

sentences.english: He could hear snatches of conversation from across the room.
sentences.chinese: 他从房间对面听得到零星的对话。

detailed_translations.english: an informal talk in which people exchange news, feelings, and thoughts

name: database
trans: A database is a collection of data that is organized and stored in a way that allows easy access, retrieval, and manipulation.

sentences.english: customer details held on a database
sentences.chinese: 存储在数据库内的客户详细信息

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of data stored in a computer system so that you can find and use it easily

name: enthusiasm
trans: Enthusiasm is intense and eager enjoyment, interest, or approval.

sentences.english: Gillian and Darren greeted the speakers with great enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 吉利恩和达伦非常热情地接待了演讲者。

sentences.english: We went along to the local diving club, full of enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 我们兴高采烈地去了当地的潜水俱乐部。

sentences.english: They go about their tasks with little enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 他们执行任务时没多大干劲。

sentences.english: A delay of two hours did not dampen their enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 耽误了两小时没有减弱他们的热情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热情， 热心， 热忱； 巨大兴趣
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of interest and enjoyment about something and an eagerness to be involved in it

name: error
trans: An error is a mistake or fault that is made, often resulting in incorrect or unexpected results.

sentences.english: There must be an error in our calculations.
sentences.chinese: 我们的计算肯定有错。

detailed_translations.english: a mistake

name: explanation
trans: An explanation is a statement or account that makes something clear or easy to understand.

sentences.english: She told the court she would give a full explanation of the prosecution's decision on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉法庭她将在星期一就控方的决定做出详尽的解释。

detailed_translations.english: a statement, fact, or situation that tells you why sth happened; a reason given for sth

name: farmer
trans: A farmer is a person who cultivates crops and/or raises animals for food production.

sentences.english: She dickered with the farmer for the best fruit.
sentences.chinese: 她要买最好的水果而跟农民讨价还价。

sentences.english: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.
sentences.chinese: 那个农民挨家挨户兜售他的水果。

sentences.english: As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.
sentences.chinese: 作为农民，你应该学会怎样把一对牛用轭连起来。

name: gate
trans: A gate is a movable barrier used to control access to a particular area, such as a field, yard, or garden.

sentences.english: We went through the gate into the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过大门进了果园。

sentences.english: the wrought-iron gates of the palace
sentences.chinese: 宫殿的锻铁大门

detailed_translations.english: the part of a fence or outside wall that you can open and close so that you can enter or leave a place
to provide with a gate or gates

name: girl
trans: A girl is a female child or young woman.

sentences.english: Both boys and girls can apply to join the choir.
sentences.chinese: 男孩和女孩均可申请加入合唱团。

sentences.english: Girls! Please be quiet.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们！请安静。

sentences.english: a teenage girl
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的女孩

sentences.english: They have two girls and a boy.
sentences.chinese: 他们有两个女孩和一个男孩。

detailed_translations.english: a female child

name: hall
trans: A hall is a large room used for public gatherings or events.

sentences.english: a huge tiled entrance hall
sentences.chinese: 铺着地砖的大门厅

sentences.english: Each floor had ten rooms on both sides of the hall.
sentences.chinese: 每一层在走廊的两边都各有十个房间。

detailed_translations.english: the area just inside the door of a house or other building, that leads to other rooms

name: historian
trans: A historian is a person who studies and writes about history, especially one who is an authority on it.

sentences.english: I am a historian, and I teach in an American university.
sentences.chinese: 我是一位历史学家，在美国一所大学任教。

sentences.english: "There’s nothing I can tell you about how [this or] any other incidents were or are handled, " CIA historian David Robarge said.
sentences.chinese: “关于[这一或]或任何其他事故是如何处理的，我没有什么可以告诉你的，”中央情报局历史学家大卫·罗巴尔说。

sentences.english: The historian drew a horizontal line on the date to remember it.
sentences.chinese: 历史学家在日期上画了一条水平线来记住这天。

detailed_translations.english: A historian is a person who specializes in the study of history, and who writes books and articles about it

name: hospital
trans: A hospital is a place where sick or injured people are given medical treatment and care.

sentences.english: They are building a new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在建一家新医院。

detailed_translations.english: a large building where sick or injured people receive medical treatment

name: injury
trans: An injury is damage or harm caused to a person's body, often resulting from an accident or physical activity.

sentences.english: She was taken to hospital with serious head injuries.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受重伤被送到医院。

sentences.english: Beckham has missed several games through injury
sentences.chinese: 贝克汉姆因伤错过了几场比赛。

sentences.english: He’s a lawyer who specializes in personal injury claims.
sentences.chinese: 他是个专门从事人身伤害索赔的律师。

detailed_translations.english: a wound or damage to part of your body caused by an accident or attack

name: instruction
trans: Instruction is the act of teaching or providing information, guidance, or directions.

sentences.english: (= I have been told ) to give the package to him personally.
sentences.chinese: 我接到的指示是亲手把包裹交给他。

sentences.english: Make sure you carry out the doctor’s instructions.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要遵照医生的嘱咐。

sentences.english: The school gives instruction in first aid.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校教授急救课

detailed_translations.english: a statement telling someone what they must do

name: maintenance
trans: Maintenance is the act of keeping something in good condition.

sentences.english: the cost of repairs and maintenance
sentences.chinese: 维修保养费

sentences.english: The theatres were closed on Saturday and Sunday for routine maintenance .
sentences.chinese: 戏院周六和周日关闭进行例行维护。

sentences.english: Engineers are carrying out essential maintenance work on the main line to Cambridge.
sentences.chinese: 机修工正在对通往剑桥的干线进行必要的养护。

sentences.english: an evening class in car maintenance
sentences.chinese: 汽车保养的夜校课程

detailed_translations.chinese: 维持； 保养； 抚养费
detailed_translations.english: the repairs, painting etc that are necessary to keep something in good condition

name: manufacturer
trans: A manufacturer is a company or person that makes products.

sentences.english: Read the manufacturer’s instructions before using your new dishwasher.
sentences.chinese: 使用新洗碗机之前，请先阅读厂家的说明书。

sentences.english: The fridge was sent back to the manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 那台冰箱被退还给厂家了。

detailed_translations.english: a company that makes large quantities of goods

name: meal
trans: A meal is an occasion when you eat food, especially breakfast, lunch or dinner.

sentences.english: We must have a meal together some time.
sentences.chinese: 我们一定要找个时间一起吃顿饭。

sentences.english: Dinner is the main meal of the day for most people.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭是大多数人一天中的主餐。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you eat food, for example breakfast or dinner, or the food that you eat on that occasion

name: perception
trans: Perception is the way you think about or understand something.

sentences.english: And when they do, what do you think their perception will be?
sentences.chinese: 当他们这样做时，你觉得他们的知觉是怎样的？

detailed_translations.english: Perception is the recognition of things using your senses, especially the sense of sight

name: pie
trans: A pie is a baked dish with a pastry crust that usually contains sweet or savory filling.

sentences.english: Would you like another piece of apple pie?
sentences.chinese: 想再来一块苹果派吗？

detailed_translations.english: fruit baked inside a  pastry  covering

name: poem
trans: A poem is a piece of writing in which the words are chosen for their beauty and sound and are often arranged in short lines.

sentences.english: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.chinese: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.english: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.chinese: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing that expresses emotions, experiences, and ideas, especially in short lines using words that  rhyme (= end with the same sound )

name: presence
trans: Presence refers to the fact of being in a particular place.

sentences.english: Your presence is requested at the club meeting on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 敬请出席于周五举行的俱乐部会议。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is present in a particular place

name: proposal
trans: A proposal is a suggestion or plan that is put forward for consideration or discussion.

sentences.english: The president is to put forward new proposals for resolving the country's constitutional crisis.
sentences.chinese: 总统将提出解决国家宪法危机的新议案。

sentences.english: She politely declined his proposal of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她礼貌地拒绝了他的求婚。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion which is made formally to an official person or group, or the act of making it

name: reception
trans: Reception is the act of receiving or the place where guests or visitors are received.

sentences.english: She was unsure of her reception after everything that had happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生了这些事后，她对自己是否还受欢迎没把握。

sentences.english: The plans received a mixed reception from unions (= some people liked them, others did not ) .
sentences.chinese: 各工会对这些计划反响不一。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of welcome for someone, or a particular type of reaction to their ideas, work etc

name: replacement
trans: A replacement is something that is used to replace something else that is broken or lost.

sentences.english: Our old car is badly in need of replacement.
sentences.chinese: 我们的旧车急需更换。

sentences.english: replacement windows
sentences.chinese: 新换的窗户

detailed_translations.english: when you get something that is newer or better than the one you had before

name: revolution
trans: Revolution is a sudden and often violent change in the political system or the way of doing things.

sentences.english: the French Revolution of 1789
sentences.chinese: 1789年法国大革命

sentences.english: the planets’ revolution around the sun
sentences.chinese: 行星围绕太阳的公转

detailed_translations.english: an attempt, by a large number of people, to change the government of a country, especially by violent action

name: river
trans: A river is a large natural flow of water that runs through the land.

sentences.english: the Mississippi River
sentences.chinese: 密西西比河

sentences.english: the River Thames
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河

detailed_translations.english: a natural and continuous flow of water in a long line across a country into the sea

name: son
trans: A son is a male child of a parent or parents.

sentences.english: Her son Sean was born in 1983.
sentences.chinese: 她的儿子肖恩出生于 1983 年。

sentences.english: They have three sons and a daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他们有三个儿子和一个女儿。

sentences.english: In those days, the property went to the oldest son.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，财产由长子继承。

sentences.english: their youngest son, George
sentences.chinese: 他们最小的儿子乔治

detailed_translations.chinese: 儿子；孩子（对年轻人的称呼）；男性后裔
detailed_translations.english: someone’s male child

name: speech
trans: A speech is a formal talk given to an audience, especially one given by someone in a position of authority.

sentences.english: He has to make a lot of after-dinner speeches .
sentences.chinese: 他经常要发表席后演说。

sentences.english: Collins gave the keynote speech (= most important speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 科林斯作了主题发言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲；讲话；[语] 语音；演说
detailed_translations.english: a talk, especially a formal one about a particular subject, given to a group of people

name: tea
trans: Tea is a hot drink made by pouring boiling water over dried leaves from the tea plant.

sentences.english: Would you like a cup of tea or coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你想来一杯茶还是咖啡？

sentences.english: Do you take milk and sugar in your tea?
sentences.chinese: 你的茶里面要放牛奶和糖吗？

sentences.english: I’d like two teas and a piece of chocolate cake, please.
sentences.chinese: 我想要两杯茶和一块巧克力蛋糕。

detailed_translations.english: a hot brown drink made by pouring boiling water onto the dried leaves from a particular Asian bush, or a cup of this drink

name: village
trans: A village is a small community in a rural area.

sentences.english: a little fishing village
sentences.chinese: 一座小渔村

detailed_translations.english: a very small town in the countryside

name: warning
trans: A warning is something that makes you aware of a danger or problem.

sentences.english: a warning that grey squirrels are threatening the existence of red squirrels
sentences.chinese: 关于灰松鼠正威胁到红松鼠生存的警告

detailed_translations.english: something, especially a statement, that tells you that something bad, dangerous, or annoying might happen so that you can be ready or avoid it

name: winner
trans: A winner is a person or thing that wins a competition or game.

sentences.english: Five lucky winners will each receive a signed copy of the album.
sentences.chinese: 五位幸运的获胜者每人将得到一张签名专辑。

sentences.english: As a jockey he rode 10 winners.
sentences.chinese: 作为骑师他曾十度驾驭获胜赛马。

detailed_translations.english: a person or animal that has won something

name: worker
trans: A worker is a person who does a job to earn money.

sentences.english: the workers’ revolution
sentences.chinese: 工人阶级革命

detailed_translations.english: the members of the  working class

name: writer
trans: A writer is a person who writes books, stories or articles as a job or hobby.

sentences.english: She’s one of my favourite writers.
sentences.chinese: 她是我最喜欢的作家之一。

sentences.english: a science-fiction writer
sentences.chinese: 科幻小说作家

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes books, stories etc, especially as a job

name: assistance
trans: Assistance is help or support that is given to someone who needs it.

sentences.english: We offer financial assistance to students.
sentences.chinese: 我们向学生提供经济援助。

sentences.english: Can I be of any assistance (=  can I help you  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 我能帮什么忙吗？

detailed_translations.english: help or support

name: breath
trans: Breath is the air that you take into your lungs and then let out again through your mouth or nose.

sentences.english: Slow down, I need to catch my breath.
sentences.chinese: 慢一点，我要喘口气。

detailed_translations.english: the air that you take into your lungs and send out again

name: buyer
trans: A buyer is a person who buys something.

sentences.english: There were several potential buyers.
sentences.chinese: 有好几个潜在的买家。

sentences.english: discounts for first-time buyers
sentences.chinese: 为首次购买的顾客提供的折扣

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys something expensive such as a house or car

name: chest
trans: A chest is a large box with a lid that is used for storing things.

sentences.english: Her heart was pounding in her chest.
sentences.chinese: 她的心在胸口怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: a hairy chest
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的胸部

detailed_translations.english: the front part of your body between your neck and your stomach

name: chocolate
trans: Chocolate is a sweet food made from roasted and ground cacao seeds, often combined with sugar and milk.

sentences.english: a chocolate bar
sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: a packet of chocolate biscuits
sentences.chinese: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.english: I prefer milk chocolate to dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 和黑巧克力比起来，我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

sentences.english: a box of chocolates
sentences.chinese: 一盒巧克力糖

detailed_translations.english: a sweet brown food that you can eat as a sweet or use in cooking to give foods such as cakes a special sweet taste

name: conclusion
trans: Conclusion is a decision or opinion reached after considering something.

sentences.english: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.english: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.english: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.chinese: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.english: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.chinese: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.english: It’s important not to jump to conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.english: The police came to the inescapable conclusion that the children had been murdered.
sentences.chinese: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

sentences.english: At the conclusion of the meeting, little progress had been made.
sentences.chinese: 会议开到最后，没有取得多少进展。

detailed_translations.english: something you decide after considering all the information you have

name: contribution
trans: Contribution is the act of giving or doing something, especially to a common fund or for a particular purpose.

sentences.english: All the money has been raised by voluntary contribution.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些钱都是靠自愿捐献筹集的。

detailed_translations.english: something that you give or do in order to help something be successful

name: cookie
trans: A cookie is a small, sweet baked treat that is usually round or flat and often contains chocolate chips, nuts or other ingredients.

sentences.english: a glass of milk and a cookie
sentences.chinese: 一杯牛奶和一块小甜饼

sentences.english: a chocolate chip cookie
sentences.chinese: 带巧克力碎粒的小甜饼

detailed_translations.english: a small flat sweet cake

name: courage
trans: Courage is the ability to do something difficult or dangerous, even in the face of fear or uncertainty.

sentences.english: Sue showed great courage throughout her illness.
sentences.chinese: 休在生病期间表现出了极大的勇气。

sentences.english: Driving again after his accident must have taken a lot of courage (= needed courage ) .
sentences.chinese: 他出事故后再驾车肯定需要很大的勇气。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being brave when you are facing a difficult or dangerous situation or when you are very ill

name: dad
trans: Dad is a term of affectionate address for one's father.

sentences.english: She lives with her mom and dad.
sentences.chinese: 她和爸爸妈妈一起住。

sentences.english: Dad, will you help me?
sentences.chinese: 爸爸，帮我一下好吗？

detailed_translations.english: father

name: desk
trans: A desk is a piece of furniture with a flat surface for writing, reading or working at, often with drawers or compartments for storage.

sentences.english: Marie was sitting at her desk.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽正坐在书桌前。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture like a table, usually with drawers in it, that you sit at to write and work

name: drawer
trans: A drawer is a sliding compartment in a piece of furniture, used for storing items.

sentences.english: She took a file from her desk drawer .
sentences.chinese: 她从书桌的抽屉里拿出了一个文件夹。

sentences.english: The scissors are in the kitchen drawer (= drawer in a piece of kitchen furniture ) .
sentences.chinese: 剪刀在厨房的抽屉里。

detailed_translations.english: part of a piece of furniture, such as a desk, that you pull out and push in and use to keep things in

name: establishment
trans: Establishment refers to a place of business or organization that has been established for a certain period of time.

sentences.english: the establishment of NATO in 1949
sentences.chinese: 1949年北约组织的建立

detailed_translations.english: the act of starting an organization, relationship, or system

name: examination
trans: Examination is the act of inspecting or analyzing something closely, especially in order to determine its quality or condition.

sentences.english: The examination results will be announced in September.
sentences.chinese: 考试成绩将于9月公布。

sentences.english: He’s already taken the entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 他已经参加了入学考试。

sentences.english: The proposals are still under examination.
sentences.chinese: 那些提案还在审查之中。

detailed_translations.english: a spoken or written test of knowledge, especially an important one

name: garbage
trans: Garbage refers to waste materials that are no longer wanted and are usually thrown away.

sentences.english: Can you take out the garbage when you go?
sentences.chinese: 你走的时候把垃圾带出去好吗？

detailed_translations.english: waste material, such as paper, empty containers, and food thrown away

name: grocery
trans: A grocery is a store that sells food and household items.

sentences.english: They run a small grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 他们经营一家小食品杂货店。

detailed_translations.english: food and other goods that are sold by a grocer or a supermarket

name: honey
trans: Honey is a sweet, sticky substance made by bees from nectar collected from flowers.

sentences.english: Hi, honey.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.english: a sweet sticky substance produced by  bees  , used as food

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…说甜言蜜语；加蜜使甜

name: impression
trans: Impression is the way that someone or something is perceived or understood by others.

sentences.english: When we looked around the school we got a very good impression.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

sentences.english: I got the impression that she wasn’t very happy with her job.
sentences.chinese: 我有这样的印象，她的工作干得并不愉快。

sentences.english: Some of the fallen trees had left a clear impression in the hardened mud.
sentences.chinese: 有一些倒下的树木在坚硬的泥地上留下了清晰的压痕。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion or feeling you have about someone or something because of the way they seem

name: improvement
trans: Improvement is the act of making something better or improving its quality or condition.

sentences.english: Our results have shown some improvement this month.
sentences.chinese: 我们的成绩这个月有所提高。

sentences.english: Are you making some improvements to your home?
sentences.chinese: 你在改善家里的居住条件吗？

detailed_translations.english: the act of improving something or the state of being improved

name: independence
trans: Independence is the state of being free from the control or influence of others.

sentences.english: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.chinese: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立； 自主； 自立
detailed_translations.english: political freedom from control by the government of another country

name: insect
trans: An insect is a small creature with six legs and sometimes wings, such as a bee, fly or ant.

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

name: inspection
trans: Inspection is the act of examining or checking something carefully.

sentences.english: An inspection was carried out at the school.
sentences.chinese: 有人来学校视察了一遍。

sentences.english: However, on closer inspection, a number of problems emerged.
sentences.chinese: 然而，经进一步检查，很多问题冒了出来。

detailed_translations.english: an official visit to a building or organization to check that everything is satisfactory and that rules are being obeyed

name: inspector
trans: An inspector is a person who inspects or examines something, especially for quality or safety.

sentences.english: ticket inspectors
sentences.chinese: 查票员

sentences.english: a Health and Safety inspector
sentences.chinese: 健康安全督察员

sentences.english: Standards of discipline at the school were strongly criticized in the inspector’s report.
sentences.chinese: 督察员在报告里狠狠地批评了这所学校的纪律水准。

detailed_translations.english: an official whose job is to check that something is satisfactory and that rules are being obeyed

name: king
trans: A king is a male ruler of a country or territory.

sentences.english: On 2 December Henry VI was crowned king (= made the king at an official ceremony ).
sentences.chinese: 12月2日，亨利六世加冕为王。

detailed_translations.english: a man who rules a country because he is from a royal family

detailed_translations.chinese: 主要的，最重要的，最大的

name: ladder
trans: A ladder is a device consisting of a series of rungs or steps used for climbing up or down something.

sentences.english: She climbed up the ladder.
sentences.chinese: 她爬上梯子。

sentences.english: He hurt himself falling off a ladder.
sentences.chinese: 他从梯子上摔下来受了伤。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used for climbing up to or down from high places. A ladder has two bars that are connected by rungs(= short bars that you use as steps ) .

name: menu
trans: A menu is a list of food and drink items available at a restaurant or other establishment.

sentences.english: Could we have the menu, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把菜单给我们，好吗？

sentences.english: a three course set menu
sentences.chinese: 三道菜的套餐

detailed_translations.english: a list of all the kinds of food that are available for a meal, especially in a restaurant

name: penalty
trans: A penalty is a punishment imposed for breaking a law or rule.

sentences.english: No littering. Penalty $500.
sentences.chinese: 禁止乱扔垃圾。 违者罚款500美元。

sentences.english: Withdrawing the money early will result in a 10% penalty.
sentences.chinese: 提前支取这笔钱将被处以10%的罚金。

sentences.english: If he is convicted, he could receive the death penalty (= be killed as a punishment ) .
sentences.chinese: 一旦定罪，他可能会被判处死刑。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment for breaking a law, rule, or legal agreement

name: piano
trans: A piano is a musical instrument with a keyboard and strings that are struck by hammers when the keys are played.

sentences.english: Jean accompanied her on the piano .
sentences.chinese: 琼为她钢琴伴奏。

detailed_translations.english: a large musical instrument that has a long row of black and white  key s  . You play the piano by sitting in front of it and pressing the keys.

name: potato
trans: A potato is a starchy root vegetable that is commonly used in cooking.

sentences.english: Marie stood at the sink, peeling potatoes (= cutting off the skin ) .
sentences.chinese: 玛丽站在洗涤槽边削土豆皮。

detailed_translations.chinese: [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯
detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or pale yellow skin, that grows under the ground

name: profession
trans: A profession is a type of job or occupation that requires special training or education.

sentences.english: people who work in the professions
sentences.chinese: 从事专业性工作的人

sentences.english: nurses, social workers, and other people in the caring professions
sentences.chinese: 护士、社工和其他从事护理行业的人

detailed_translations.english: a job that needs a high level of education and training

name: professor
trans: A professor is a senior teacher in a college or university who is an expert in their field of study.

sentences.english: The professor improvised a poem in the class.
sentences.chinese: 教授在课堂上即兴创作了一首诗。

sentences.english: The professor lambasted me for my careless mistake.
sentences.chinese: 教授严厉批评了我的粗心错误。

sentences.english: We were laughing about that absent-minded professor.
sentences.chinese: 我们都在笑那个心不在焉的教授。

name: quantity
trans: Quantity refers to the amount or number of something, often measured or expressed in numerical terms.

sentences.english: Your work has improved in quantity and quality this term.
sentences.chinese: 这学期你的作业在完成数量和质量上都有提高。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that can be counted or measured

name: reaction
trans: A reaction is a response to something that happens, often involving emotions or physical changes.

sentences.english: What was Jeff’s reaction when you told him about the job?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉杰夫这个工作时，他是什么反应？

detailed_translations.english: something that you feel or do because of something that has happened or been said

name: requirement
trans: A requirement is something that is necessary or mandatory in order to achieve a certain goal or meet a certain standard.

sentences.english: The refugees’ main requirements are food and shelter.
sentences.chinese: 难民的主要需求是食物和住所。

sentences.english: to meet/fulfil/satisfy the requirements
sentences.chinese: 符合 / 满足必备的条件

detailed_translations.english: something that someone needs or asks for

name: salad
trans: A salad is a mixture of vegetables, fruits, and sometimes meat or other ingredients, usually served cold with a dressing.

sentences.english: Would you like some salad with your pasta?
sentences.chinese: 你的意大利面要配些色拉吗？

sentences.english: a spinach salad
sentences.chinese: 菠菜色拉

detailed_translations.english: a mixture of raw vegetables, especially  lettuce  ,  cucumber  , and tomato

name: sister
trans: A sister is a female sibling, either younger or older.

sentences.english: Janet and Abby are sisters.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.english: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.chinese: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.english: She’s my twin sister .
sentences.chinese: 她是我的孪生妹妹。

sentences.english: ...the International Monetary Fund and its sister organization, the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士
detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

name: supermarket
trans: A supermarket is a large store that sells a wide variety of food, household items, and other consumer goods.

sentences.english: His eyes roved round the supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛环视了一下超级市场。

sentences.english: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.chinese: 整个超级市场被一场大火烧掉。

sentences.english: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校附近的那个超级市场不久将重新开业。

detailed_translations.english: a very large shop that sells food, drinks, and things that people need regularly in their homes

name: tongue
trans: The tongue is the muscular organ inside the mouth that is used for tasting, speaking, and swallowing.

sentences.english: Joe ran his tongue over his dry lips.
sentences.chinese: 乔舔了舔干燥的嘴唇。

sentences.english: The taste of the chocolate was still on her tongue.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力的余味依然留在她的舌尖。

sentences.english: The girl scowled at me, then stuck out her tongue .
sentences.chinese: 女孩怒视着我，然后吐了一下舌头。

detailed_translations.english: the soft part inside your mouth that you can move about and use for eating and speaking
to use your tongue to make separate sounds when playing a musical instrument

name: weakness
trans: Weakness refers to a lack of strength or ability, often physical or emotional in nature.

sentences.english: The legislation has a fundamental weakness.
sentences.chinese: 这项立法有一个根本性缺陷。

sentences.english: The plan has strengths and weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划既有优点又有缺点。

sentences.english: muscular weakness
sentences.chinese: 肌无力

sentences.english: weakness in the economy
sentences.chinese: 经济疲软

detailed_translations.english: a fault in someone’s character or in a system, organization, design etc

name: wedding
trans: A wedding is a ceremony where two people get married and exchange vows to become life partners.

sentences.english: She’s busy planning her daughter’s wedding.
sentences.chinese: 她正忙着筹备女儿的婚礼。

sentences.english: When is the wedding?
sentences.chinese: 婚礼是什么时候？

detailed_translations.english: a marriage ceremony, especially one with a religious service

name: affair
trans: An affair refers to a romantic or sexual relationship between two people who are not married to each other.

sentences.english: Are you interested in world affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你对世界大事感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交部

sentences.english: Women had little role in public affairs.
sentences.chinese: 女性过去几乎不参与公共事务。

sentences.english: the Watergate affair
sentences.chinese: 水门事件

sentences.english: He had an affair with his boss that lasted six years.
sentences.chinese: 他和老板的暧昧关系持续了六年。

detailed_translations.english: public or political events and activities

name: ambition
trans: Ambition is a strong desire or goal to achieve something, often involving personal or career advancement.

sentences.english: He was young and full of ambition.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻，而且雄心勃勃。

detailed_translations.english: determination to be successful, rich, powerful etc

name: analyst
trans: An analyst is a person who examines and interprets data, often for business or financial purposes.

sentences.english: Political analysts expect the Conservatives to win.
sentences.chinese: 政治分析家预计保守党获胜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分析者；精神分析医师；分解者
detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to think about something carefully in order to understand it, and often to advise other people about it

name: apple
trans: An apple is a round fruit with a red, green, or yellow skin and a white inside, often eaten raw or used in cooking or baking.

sentences.english: apple pie
sentences.chinese: 苹果馅饼

sentences.english: an apple tree
sentences.chinese: 苹果树

sentences.english: roast pork and apple sauce (=  a thick sauce made from cooked apples  )
sentences.chinese: 烤猪肉配苹果酱汁

detailed_translations.english: a hard round fruit that has red, light green, or yellow skin and is white inside

name: assignment
trans: An assignment is a task or project that is given to someone to complete, often as part of a course of study or job.

sentences.english: She’s gone to Italy on a special assignment.
sentences.chinese: 她去意大利执行一项特殊任务。

sentences.english: a history assignment
sentences.chinese: 历史作业

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is given to someone as part of their job

name: assistant
trans: An assistant is a person who helps or supports someone in their work or duties.

sentences.english: a clerical assistant
sentences.chinese: 文书助理

sentences.english: ...the assistant secretary of defence.
sentences.chinese: …助理国防部长。

detailed_translations.english: someone who helps someone else in their work, especially by doing the less important jobs

detailed_translations.chinese: 辅助的，助理的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: Assistant is used in front of titles or jobs to indicate a slightly lower rank. For example, an assistant director is one rank lower than a director in an organization.

name: bathroom
trans: A bathroom is a room in a house or building that is used for personal hygiene activities such as bathing and using the toilet.

sentences.english: The water shed from the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 水是从浴室中溢出来的。

sentences.english: We revamped our bathroom last month.
sentences.chinese: 我们在上个月装修了浴室。

sentences.english: My glasses steamed when I came into the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 我走进浴室时，眼镜上蒙上了一层水气。

detailed_translations.english: a room where there is a bath or  shower  , a  basin  , and sometimes a toilet

name: bedroom
trans: A bedroom is a room in a house or apartment where people sleep and keep their personal belongings.

sentences.english: a hotel with 50 bedrooms
sentences.chinese: 有50间客房的旅馆

detailed_translations.english: a room for sleeping in

detailed_translations.chinese: 两性关系的；城郊住宅区的

name: beer
trans: Beer is an alcoholic beverage made from fermented grains, often served cold in a glass or bottle.

sentences.english: a pint of beer
sentences.chinese: 一品脱啤酒

sentences.english: We sell draught beer (=  beer served from a large container, not a bottle  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们出售散装啤酒。

detailed_translations.english: an alcoholic drink made from  malt  and  hop s

name: birthday
trans: A birthday is the anniversary of the day on which a person was born, often celebrated with a party or other festivities.

sentences.english: It’s my birthday on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 星期一是我的生日。

sentences.english: My aunt called to wish me a happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我姑妈打电话来祝我生日快乐。

sentences.english: The City of Cleveland Orchestra is celebrating its 200th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 克利夫兰市管弦乐队正在庆祝乐队成立200周年。

detailed_translations.english: the day in each year which is the same date as the one on which you were born

name: celebration
trans: A celebration is an event or occasion to mark a special or significant moment, often involving festivities or ceremonies.

sentences.english: the lively New Year celebrations in the city centre
sentences.chinese: 市中心热闹的新年庆祝活动

detailed_translations.english: an occasion or party when you celebrate something

name: championship
trans: A championship is a competition or series of competitions to determine the best team or individual in a particular sport or activity.

sentences.english: the women’s figure skating championships
sentences.chinese: 女子花样滑冰锦标赛

sentences.english: Greece won the European Championship.
sentences.chinese: 希腊队赢得了欧洲锦标赛的冠军。

detailed_translations.chinese: 锦标赛；冠军称号；冠军的地位
detailed_translations.english: a competition to find which player, team etc is the best in a particular sport

name: cheek
trans: A cheek is one of the two fleshy parts of the face that form the lower edge of the eye socket and the upper edge of the jaw.

sentences.english: Lucy stretched up to kiss his cheek.
sentences.chinese: 露西伸长了脖子去亲吻他的脸颊。

sentences.english: Billy had rosy cheeks and blue eyes.
sentences.chinese: 比利脸颊红润，长着一双蓝眼睛。

sentences.english: her tear-stained cheeks
sentences.chinese: 她泪痕斑斑的脸颊

sentences.english: Julie’s cheeks flushed with pleasure at the compliment.
sentences.chinese: 听了这赞美的话，朱莉开心得满脸通红。

detailed_translations.english: the soft round part of your face below each of your eyes

detailed_translations.chinese: 无礼地向…讲话，对…大胆无礼
detailed_translations.english: to speak rudely or with disrespect to someone, especially to someone older such as your teacher or parents

name: client
trans: A client is a person or organization that receives services or advice from a professional or business.

sentences.english: a meeting with an important client
sentences.chinese: 与一位重要客户的会面

detailed_translations.english: someone who gets services or advice from a professional person, company, or organization

name: consequence
trans: A consequence is a result or effect of an action or decision, often with implications or repercussions.

sentences.english: Her lawyer said she understood the consequences of her actions and was prepared to go to jail.
sentences.chinese: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果并准备去坐牢。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens as a result of a particular action or set of conditions

name: departure
trans: Departure is the act of leaving or starting a journey, often from a specific place such as a airport or train station.

sentences.english: There are several departures for New York every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天有好几个班次去纽约。

detailed_translations.english: an act of leaving a place, especially at the start of a journey

name: diamond
trans: A diamond is a precious stone that is used in jewelry and is known for its exceptional hardness and sparkle.

sentences.english: a diamond engagement ring
sentences.chinese: 订婚钻戒

detailed_translations.chinese: 钻石，金刚石；菱形；方块牌
detailed_translations.english: a clear, very hard valuable stone, used in jewellery and in industry

name: dirt
trans: Dirt is loose soil or earth, often found on the ground or under plants, and can also refer to grime or stains on surfaces.

sentences.english: You should have seen the dirt on that car!
sentences.chinese: 你没看见那车上沾了多少泥！

sentences.english: His face and hands were black with dirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸和手黑乎乎的，全是泥。

sentences.english: Michael threw his handful of dirt onto the coffin.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔往棺材上撒了一把土。

detailed_translations.english: any substance that makes things dirty, such as mud or dust

name: ear
trans: The ear is the organ in the human body that is used for hearing and balance, consisting of the outer, middle, and inner ear.

sentences.english: She tucked her hair behind her ears.
sentences.chinese: 她把头发拢到耳朵背后。

detailed_translations.english: one of the organs on either side of your head that you hear with

name: fortune
trans: Fortune refers to luck or chance, often with respect to wealth or success.

sentences.english: I had the good fortune to work with a brilliant head of department.
sentences.chinese: 我有幸与一位出色的部门主管共事。

sentences.english: Sickness or ill fortune could reduce you to a needy situation.
sentences.chinese: 疾病或厄运会让你穷困潦倒。

sentences.english: I felt it was useless to struggle against fortune.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得跟命运抗争是徒劳的。

detailed_translations.english: chance or luck, and the effect that it has on your life

name: friendship
trans: Friendship is a close and loyal relationship between two people who share mutual trust, support, and affection.

sentences.english: her close friendship with her aunt
sentences.chinese: 她与姑母的亲密友谊

sentences.english: a lifelong friendship
sentences.chinese: 一生的友谊

sentences.english: The two boys formed a deep and lasting friendship .
sentences.chinese: 这两个男孩子建立了深厚持久的友谊。

sentences.english: I could always rely on Gary for friendship and support.
sentences.chinese: 我总是可以依靠加里的友情和支持。

detailed_translations.english: a relationship between friends

name: funeral
trans: A funeral is a ceremony or service that is held to honor and remember a person who has died, often involving rituals and traditions specific to the culture or religion of the deceased.

sentences.english: The funeral will be held at St. Martin’s Church.
sentences.chinese: 葬礼将在圣马丁教堂举行。

sentences.english: Hundreds of mourners attended the funeral of the two boys.
sentences.chinese: 数百名哀悼者参加了那两个男孩的葬礼。

sentences.english: the minister who conducted the funeral service
sentences.chinese: 主持葬礼的牧师

sentences.english: Nelson’s funeral procession down the Thames
sentences.chinese: 沿泰晤士河而下为纳尔逊送葬的队伍

sentences.english: Ramdas set fire to the funeral pyre .
sentences.chinese: 拉姆达斯点燃了火葬柴堆。

detailed_translations.english: a religious ceremony for burying or cremating someone who has died

name: gene
trans: A gene is a unit of hereditary information that is passed down from parents to offspring, determining certain traits or characteristics.

sentences.english: human genes
sentences.chinese: 人类基因

sentences.english: the genes that regulate cell division
sentences.chinese: 控制细胞分裂的基因

detailed_translations.english: a part of a cell in a living thing that controls what it looks like, how it grows, and how it develops. People get their genes from their parents

name: girlfriend
trans: A girlfriend is a female romantic partner or companion, often in a committed relationship.

sentences.english: He’s never had a girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 他从来没有交过女朋友。

sentences.english: one of my ex-girlfriends
sentences.chinese: 我的一个前女友

sentences.english: I didn’t have a steady girlfriend (= one you have a long relationship with ) .
sentences.chinese: 我那时没有固定的女友。

detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman that you are having a romantic relationship with

name: hat
trans: A hat is a type of headwear that is worn on top of the head, often for protection from the sun or for fashion purposes.

sentences.english: Maria was wearing a beautiful new hat.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that you wear on your head

name: indication
trans: An indication is a sign or signal that suggests something, often used to convey information or point to a certain direction or meaning.

sentences.english: Could you give me some indication as to when I am likely to receive a reply?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我透露一下什么时候我能收到回复吗？

sentences.english: Indications are that the situation hasn’t improved much.
sentences.chinese: 迹象表明局势并没有多大好转。

sentences.english: There is every indication (= there are very clear signs ) that it is true.
sentences.chinese: 很明显这是真的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 指示， 表示， 表明； 象征， 迹象
detailed_translations.english: a sign, remark, event etc that shows what is happening, what someone is thinking or feeling, or what is true

name: intention
trans: Intention refers to a plan or purpose that someone has, often with respect to their actions or behavior.

sentences.english: They went into town with the intention of visiting the library.
sentences.chinese: 他们进了城，打算参观图书馆。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or desire to do something

name: lady
trans: A lady is a polite and respectful term for a woman, often used to show admiration or respect.

sentences.english: Lady Spencer
sentences.chinese: 斯宾塞夫人

sentences.english: the lords and ladies of the court
sentences.chinese: 宫廷的贵族及夫人

detailed_translations.english: used as the title of the wife or daughter of a British noblemanor the wife of a knight

name: midnight
trans: Midnight is the point in time that marks the start of a new day, exactly twelve o'clock at night.

sentences.english: You can’t phone her now – it’s gone midnight (= after midnight ) !
sentences.chinese: 你现在不能打电话给她，都过午夜了！

sentences.english: By the time he arrived, it was well past midnight (= after midnight ) .
sentences.chinese: 他到的时候早已经是后半夜了。

sentences.english: He’s gone for a midnight swim.
sentences.chinese: 他深更半夜去游泳了。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock at night

name: negotiation
trans: Negotiation is the process of discussing and reaching an agreement or compromise between two or more parties, often with conflicting interests or goals.

sentences.english: The trader was obstinate in the negotiation.
sentences.chinese: 这个商人在谈判中拗强固执。

detailed_translations.english: official discussions between the repre­sentatives of opposing groups who are trying to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics

name: obligation
trans: An obligation is a duty or responsibility that someone has, often based on a moral, legal, or social contract.

sentences.english: Employers have an obligation to treat all employees equally.
sentences.chinese: 雇主有责任对所有员工一视同仁。

sentences.english: Parents are under a legal obligation to educate their children.
sentences.chinese: 家长对子女的教育负有法律责任。

sentences.english: You are under no obligation to buy any more books.
sentences.chinese: 你不必非要买更多的书。

sentences.english: Greater resources are needed to meet these obligations.
sentences.chinese: 履行这些义务需要更多的资源。

sentences.english: the rights and obligations imposed on them by treaties
sentences.chinese: 条约给他们规定的权利和义务

sentences.english: The government must pay for health care for war veterans – it is an obligation we owe to them.
sentences.chinese: 政府必须为退伍军人支付医疗保健费用——这是我们对他们负有的义务。

sentences.english: a moral obligation to help the poor
sentences.chinese: 帮助穷人的道德义务

sentences.english: He stayed with the team out of a sense of obligation.
sentences.chinese: 他出于责任感而留在队里。

detailed_translations.english: a moral or legal duty to do something

name: passenger
trans: A passenger is a person who is traveling in a vehicle or on a mode of transportation, often for a journey or trip.

sentences.english: Neither the driver nor the passengers were hurt.
sentences.chinese: 司机和乘客均未受伤。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is travelling in a vehicle, plane, boat etc, but is not driving it or working on it

name: pizza
trans: Pizza is a dish that consists of a flat bread base topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various ingredients such as vegetables and meats.

sentences.english: ...the last piece of pizza.
sentences.chinese: …最后一块比萨饼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比萨饼（一种涂有乳酪核番茄酱的意大利式有馅烘饼）
detailed_translations.english: A pizza is a flat, round piece of dough covered with tomatoes, cheese, and other toppings, and then baked in an oven

name: platform
trans: A platform is a raised surface or area, often used for standing or as a base for something such as a stage or a structure.

sentences.english: The Edinburgh train will depart from platform six.
sentences.chinese: 开往爱丁堡的火车将从六号站台发车。

sentences.english: a small raised platform at one end of the room
sentences.chinese: 房间一端凸起的小讲台

sentences.english: an oil exploration platform
sentences.chinese: 石油勘探平台

detailed_translations.english: the raised place beside a railway track where you get on and off a train in a station

name: poet
trans: A poet is a writer who specializes in creating poetry, often using language and rhythm to express emotions, ideas, or experiences.

sentences.english: He was a painter and poet.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位画家兼诗人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes poems

name: pollution
trans: Pollution is the presence or introduction into the environment of harmful substances or contaminants that can damage ecosystems, health, or quality of life.

sentences.english: California’s tough anti-pollution laws
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州严厉的反污染法

detailed_translations.english: the process of making air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use, or the state of being dangerously dirty

name: recognition
trans: Recognition is the act of acknowledging or identifying someone or something, often with respect to achievements, contributions, or qualities.

sentences.english: He stared at her, but there was no sign of recognition .
sentences.chinese: 他盯着她看，但似乎没认出她来。

detailed_translations.english: the act of knowing someone or something because you have known or learned about them in the past

name: reputation
trans: Reputation is the overall perception or evaluation of someone or something, often based on their behavior, performance, or image.

sentences.english: Alice Munro has a reputation for being a very depressing writer.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯•门罗有文风抑郁的名声。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion that people have about someone or something because of what has happened in the past

name: shirt
trans: A shirt is a garment worn on the upper body, often with a collar, buttons, and sleeves, and typically made of cotton or other fabrics.

sentences.english: I have to wear a shirt and tie to work.
sentences.chinese: 我上班要穿衬衫打领带。

sentences.english: a check shirt
sentences.chinese: 格子衬衫

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the upper part of your body and your arms, usually has a collar, and is fastened at the front by buttons

name: sir
trans: Sir is a polite and respectful term of address for a man, often used to show respect or courtesy.

sentences.english: ‘Report back to me in an hour, sergeant.’ ‘Yes, sir.’
sentences.chinese: “一小时后向我报告，中士。”“是，长官。”

sentences.english: Can I help you, sir?
sentences.chinese: 我能为您效劳吗，先生？

sentences.english: Sir! You dropped your wallet.
sentences.chinese: 先生！ 您的钱包掉了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 先生；（用于姓名前）爵士；阁下；（中小学生对男教师的称呼）先生；老师
detailed_translations.english: used when speaking to a man in order to be polite or show respect

name: speaker
trans: A speaker is someone who talks to an audience.

sentences.english: The keynote speaker (= main or most important speaker ) was Robert Venturi, the architect.
sentences.chinese: 主要发言人是建筑师罗伯特·文图里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲者；扬声器；说话者；说某种语言的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who makes a formal speech to a group of people

name: stranger
trans: A stranger is someone who you do not know.

sentences.english: Children must not talk to strangers.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子千万不要同陌生人说话。

sentences.english: Sorry, I don't know where the bank is. I'm a stranger here myself.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不知道银行在哪儿。我不是本地人。

detailed_translations.english: someone that you do not know

name: surgery
trans: Surgery is a medical operation performed by a doctor to treat an injury or disease.

sentences.english: major/minor surgery
sentences.chinese: 大 / 小手术

detailed_translations.english: medical treatment of injuries or diseases that involves cutting open a person's body and often removing or replacing some parts; the branch of medicine connected with this treatment

name: sympathy
trans: Sympathy is a feeling of sadness or pity for someone who is suffering.

sentences.english: Our sympathies are with the families of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 我们向受害者家庭表示慰问。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being sorry for someone who is in a bad situation

name: tale
trans: A tale is a story, often fictional or imaginary.

sentences.english: a book of old Japanese folk tales
sentences.chinese: 日本古老民间故事书

sentences.english: a fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen
sentences.chinese: 安徒生的一则童话

sentences.english: a cautionary tale
sentences.chinese: 警示故事

sentences.english: tales of her life in post-war Berlin
sentences.chinese: 有关她在战后柏林生活的传闻

detailed_translations.english: a story about exciting imaginary events

name: throat
trans: The throat is the part of the body that connects the mouth and the stomach.

sentences.english: The singer complained of a sore throat after Wednesday’s show.
sentences.chinese: 星期三演出后，这位歌手说喉咙痛。

detailed_translations.english: the passage from the back of your mouth to the top of the tubes that go down to your lungs and stomach

name: trainer
trans: A trainer is a person who helps someone to learn a particular skill or activity.

sentences.english: a racehorse trainer
sentences.chinese: 赛马训练师

detailed_translations.chinese: 助理教练；训练员；驯马师；飞行练习器；运动鞋
detailed_translations.english: someone who trains people or animals for sport or work

name: uncle
trans: An uncle is the brother of someone's parent.

sentences.english: Lily spent years caring for her sick uncle.
sentences.chinese: 莉莉照顾了她生病的叔叔好多年。

sentences.english: After his parents cashed in, he lived with his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 他在父母去世后，与叔叔在一起过。

sentences.english: When she was orphaned,her uncle sent her to orphanage.
sentences.chinese: 她的父母刚一去世，她的叔叔便把她送进了孤儿院。

detailed_translations.english: used by children, in front of a first name, to address or refer to a man who is a close friend of their parents

name: youth
trans: Youth is the time of life when a person is young, usually referring to the teenage years.

sentences.english: Despite his youth, he had travelled alone.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然年纪还小，却已独自旅行过了。

sentences.english: The youth of today are the pensioners of tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今天的年轻人就是明天领养老金的人。

detailed_translations.english: the quality or state of being young

name: time
trans: Time is the ongoing sequence of events that occur in the past, present, and future.

sentences.english: Einstein changed the way we think about space and time.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦改变了我们的时空概念。

sentences.english: close relationships established over a long period of time
sentences.chinese: 长期建立起来的亲密关系

sentences.english: Customers have only a limited amount of time to examine the goods.
sentences.chinese: 顾客只有有限的时间可以检查商品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数
detailed_translations.english: the thing that is measured in minutes, hours, days, years etc using clocks

detailed_translations.chinese: 计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度
detailed_translations.english: to arrange that something should happen at a particular time

name: work
trans: Work is the activity of doing something to earn money or achieve a particular result.

sentences.english: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.english: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

name: film
trans: A film is a story that is shown on a screen, usually in a movie theater or on television.

sentences.english: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.chinese: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.english: I shot five rolls of film on vacation.
sentences.chinese: 我在度假时拍了五卷胶卷。

sentences.english: a film of oil on the surface of the water
sentences.chinese: 水面上的一层油

detailed_translations.english: a story that is told using sound and moving pictures, shown at a cinema or on television

name: water
trans: Water is a clear liquid that is essential for life and used for drinking, washing, and other purposes.

sentences.english: There’s water all over the bathroom floor.
sentences.chinese: 浴室地面上都是水。

sentences.english: Does anyone want a drink of water?
sentences.chinese: 有谁想喝杯水吗？

sentences.english: a glass of sparkling mineral water
sentences.chinese: 一杯有气矿泉水

sentences.english: All rooms have hot and cold running water.
sentences.chinese: 所有房间都有冷热自来水供应。

sentences.english: Pour boiling water over the rice and let it soak.
sentences.chinese: 在大米中倒入沸水浸泡。

sentences.english: a fresh water spring
sentences.chinese: 淡水泉

sentences.english: When dealing with a burst pipe, always turn off the water first.
sentences.chinese: 处理破裂水管时，一定要先把水关掉。

sentences.english: contamination of the local water supply
sentences.chinese: 当地供水受到污染

sentences.english: Will you water my houseplants while I’m away?
sentences.chinese: 我不在时你能给我家里的盆栽浇浇水吗？

sentences.english: The garden needs watering daily.
sentences.chinese: 花园每天都需要浇水。

detailed_translations.english: the clear liquid without colour, smell, or taste that falls as rain and that is used for drinking, washing etc
if you water plants or the ground they are growing in, you pour water on them

name: money
trans: Money is a medium of exchange used to buy goods and services.

sentences.english: Don’t spend all your money on the first day of your holiday!
sentences.chinese: 别在度假的第一天就把钱都花完了！

sentences.english: The repairs will cost quite a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 修理要花一大笔钱。

sentences.english: The family made their money in the woollen trade.
sentences.chinese: 这家人是做毛纺生意赚的钱。

detailed_translations.english: what you earn by working and can use to buy things. Money can be in the form of notes and coins or cheques, and can be kept in a bank

name: example
trans: An example is something that is used to show what something else is like.

sentences.english: Many countries, for example Mexico and Japan, have a lot of earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家，例如墨西哥和日本，经常发生地震。

sentences.english: Her courage is an example to us all.
sentences.chinese: 她的勇气是我们大家的榜样。

detailed_translations.english: something such as an object, a fact or a situation that shows, explains or supports what you say

name: while
trans: While is a period of time during which something else is happening.

sentences.english: They arrived while we were having dinner.
sentences.chinese: 他们来时我们正在吃饭。

sentences.english: While she was asleep, thieves broke in and stole her handbag.
sentences.chinese: 她睡着的时候，小偷闯进来偷走了她的手提包。

sentences.english: She met Andy while working on a production of Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 排练《卡门》时，她认识了安迪。

detailed_translations.english: during the time that something is happening
to spend time in a pleasant and lazy way

name: business
trans: Business is the activity of buying and selling goods and services to make a profit.

sentences.english: Students on the course learn about all aspects of business.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程的学生要学习商业活动的各个方面。

sentences.english: Carl began in the music business by running a recording studio.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔是从经营录音棚开始干音乐这一行的。

sentences.english: We do business with a number of Italian companies.
sentences.chinese: 我们和一些意大利公司做生意。

sentences.english: ...recording Ben as he goes about his business.
sentences.chinese: …摄录本做自己的事的样子。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of making money by producing or buying and selling goods, or providing services

name: study
trans: Study is the act of learning about a subject through reading, research, and practice.

sentences.english: Recent studies show that women still get paid a lot less than men.
sentences.chinese: 最近的调查表明，女性的薪水仍比男性的要低很多。

sentences.english: The study was carried out between January and May 2008.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究是在 2008 年1月到5月间进行的。

sentences.english: Set aside a period of time specifically for study.
sentences.chinese: 留出一段时间专门用于学习

sentences.english: I’ve been studying English for six years
sentences.chinese: 我学英语已有六年了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 研究 (对某一课题或问题的)；中文释义: 学习 (尤指在家里或放学后的)
detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is done to find out more about a particular subject or problem, and usually includes a written report

detailed_translations.chinese: 中文释义: 学习，攻读
detailed_translations.english: to learn about a subject at school, university etc

name: game
trans: A game is an activity or sport that is played for fun, competition, or entertainment.

sentences.english: The boys were playing a game in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在后院里玩游戏。

sentences.english: game birds
sentences.chinese: 被捕猎的鸟

detailed_translations.english: an activity or sport in which people compete with each other according to agreed rules

name: life
trans: Life is the quality that distinguishes living things from non-living things, characterized by growth, reproduction, and adaptation.

sentences.english: Learning goes on throughout life.
sentences.chinese: 学习是一生的事。

sentences.english: You have your whole life ahead of you.
sentences.chinese: 你前面还有漫长的人生呢。

sentences.english: I’ve known John all my life (= since I was born ).
sentences.chinese: 我从小就认识约翰了。

sentences.english: His main aim in life was to have fun.
sentences.chinese: 他人生的主要目标就是享乐。

sentences.english: It was one of the best days of my life.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最快乐的时光之一。

sentences.english: The accident scarred him for life (= for the rest of his life ).
sentences.chinese: 这场事故给他留下了终生的创伤。

sentences.english: She knew she’d feel guilty for the rest of her life.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己将内疚终生。

sentences.english: Raj spent his life caring for others.
sentences.chinese: 拉杰一辈子都在关爱他人。

sentences.english: Bonington spent his entire adult life in France.
sentences.chinese: 博宁顿成年后就一直在法国生活。

sentences.english: We don’t know much about the poet’s early life (= when he was young ).
sentences.chinese: 我们对这位诗人的早年生活所知甚少。

sentences.english: Poor diet can lead to a whole range of diseases in later life (= when you are older ).
sentences.chinese: 饮食不良会在晚年引发各种疾病。

sentences.english: She married late in life (= when she was fairly old ).
sentences.chinese: 她结婚晚。

sentences.english: He’s a life member (= continuing until he dies ) of the club.
sentences.chinese: 他是俱乐部的终身会员。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time when someone is alive

name: form
trans: A form is a document or template used to collect information or data.

sentences.english: We oppose racism in all its forms.
sentences.chinese: 我们反对各种形式的种族主义。

sentences.english: The female form is a thing of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 女性形体是一种美。

sentences.english: The rocks were formed more than 4,000 million years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这些岩石是40多亿年前形成的。

detailed_translations.english: the way something is or appears to be
to start to exist, or make something start to exist, especially as the result of a natural process

name: air
trans: Air is the invisible mixture of gases that surrounds the Earth and is necessary for breathing.

sentences.english: Let’s go outside and get some fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去呼吸些新鲜空气吧。

sentences.english: You need to put some air in the tyres.
sentences.chinese: 你得给轮胎充气了。

sentences.english: Flames leapt into the air.
sentences.chinese: 火苗蹿向天空。

sentences.english: He fell 2,000 metres through the air without a parachute.
sentences.chinese: 他没用降落伞在空中下落了2,000米。

detailed_translations.english: the mixture of gases around the Earth, that we breathe

name: day
trans: A day is a unit of time equal to 24 hours, during which the Earth completes one rotation on its axis.

sentences.english: We spent three days in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我们在巴黎度过了三天。

sentences.english: She only leaves her house during the day.
sentences.chinese: 她只在白天出门。

sentences.english: It was a cold blustery day.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒风呼啸的冷天。

sentences.english: Kept in that dark cell, I could no longer tell whether it was day or night.
sentences.chinese: 我被关在那个漆黑的牢房里，不知是白天还是黑夜。

sentences.english: The day dawned (= started ) bright and clear.
sentences.chinese: 拂晓时天朗气清。

detailed_translations.english: a period of 24 hours

name: place
trans: A place is a location or position in space.

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the key in a safe place.
sentences.chinese: 一定要把钥匙放在安全的地方。

sentences.english: I’ve spent the day dashing about from place to place.
sentences.chinese: 我这一天尽是在东奔西跑。

sentences.english: The place was full of screaming children.
sentences.chinese: 那地方全是大叫大嚷的孩子们。

sentences.english: He was threatening to burn the place down.
sentences.chinese: 他扬言要把那地方烧毁。

sentences.english: She had never been back to the place where the accident happened.
sentences.chinese: 她再也没回过事故发生的地点。

sentences.english: The theatre bar was our usual meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 这个剧院酒吧是我们见面的老地方。

sentences.english: We were living then in a place called Alberiga.
sentences.chinese: 那时候我们住在一个叫阿尔伯里格的地方。

sentences.english: The wall was quite damp in places (= in some places ) .
sentences.chinese: 墙上有几处很潮湿。

sentences.english: Did the accident happen at your place of work (= the place where you work ) ?
sentences.chinese: 事故是在你的工作地点发生的吗？

sentences.english: It took us ages to find a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了好长时间才找到一个住处。

detailed_translations.english: a space or area, for example a particular point on a surface or in a room, building, town, city etc

name: number
trans: A number is a mathematical value used to represent a quantity or amount.

sentences.english: They wrote various numbers on a large sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一张大纸上写下了很多不同的数字。

sentences.english: Add all the numbers together.
sentences.chinese: 把所有数字加起来。

sentences.english: Answer question number 4.
sentences.chinese: 回答第4题。
