sentences.english: Buses run at 15 and 30 minutes past the hour.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车在每小时的15分和30分时发车。

detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that people pay to travel on

name: exchange
trans: An exchange is a place where people buy and sell goods, services, or currencies.

sentences.english: We exchange gifts at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 我们在圣诞节时交换礼物。

sentences.english: It’s a place where people can chat and exchange ideas.
sentences.chinese: 在这个地方人们可以聊天和交流想法。

sentences.english: Four of my cassettes for your Madonna CD is a fair exchange.
sentences.chinese: 我用四盒磁带换你的麦当娜激光唱片很公平。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something and receive the same kind of thing from them at the same time
the act of giving someone something and receiving something else from them

name: eye
trans: An eye is the organ of sight in humans and animals.

sentences.english: He’s got beautiful eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他有一双漂亮的眼睛。

sentences.english: There were tears in her eyes as she listened to the story.
sentences.chinese: 她听故事时眼里噙着泪水。

sentences.english: A surgeon needs a good eye and a steady hand.
sentences.chinese: 做外科医生眼要准，手要稳。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two parts of the body that you use to see with

name: fire
trans: Fire is a combustion process that produces heat and light.

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

name: position
trans: Position refers to the location or placement of something.

sentences.english: Lie in a comfortable position .
sentences.chinese: 以一个舒服的姿势躺下。

sentences.english: Our hotel was in a superb central position near St Mark’s Square.
sentences.chinese: 我们的酒店处于极佳的中心位置，在圣马克广场附近。

sentences.english: Bruce is thinking of applying for the position.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯正在考虑申请那个职位。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone is standing, sitting, or lying

name: pressure
trans: Pressure is the force exerted on an object per unit area.

sentences.english: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.english: You must never give in to pressure .
sentences.chinese: 你绝不能屈从压力。

detailed_translations.english: an attempt to persuade someone by using influence, arguments, or threats

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…施加压力， 迫使， 说服
detailed_translations.english: to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it

name: stress
trans: Stress is a state of mental or emotional strain or tension caused by adverse circumstances.

sentences.english: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.english: She stressed the importance of a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to emphasize a statement, fact, or idea

name: advantage
trans: An advantage is a favorable or beneficial circumstance or condition that gives a competitive edge.

sentences.english: Younger workers tend to be at an advantage (=  have an advantage  ) when applying for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

sentences.english: One of the many advantages of living in New York is that you can eat out at almost any time of day.
sentences.chinese: 住在纽约的诸多好处之一是几乎任何时候都可以外出吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that helps you to be more successful than others, or the state of having this

name: benefit
trans: A benefit is an advantage or profit gained from something.

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

name: box
trans: A box is a container with a flat bottom and sides, typically square or rectangular in shape.

sentences.english: the jury box
sentences.chinese: 陪审团席

detailed_translations.english: a small area of a theatre or court that is separate from where other people are sitting

name: frame
trans: A frame is a rigid structure that surrounds or encloses something, often used to hold or support other objects.

sentences.english: Newman played a central role in framing the new law.
sentences.chinese: 纽曼在拟定新法的过程中发挥了主要作用。

name: issue
trans: An issue is a problem or topic that people discuss or debate.

sentences.english: Silva issued a statement denying all knowledge of the affair.
sentences.chinese: 西尔瓦发表声明，宣称对此事一无所知。

sentences.english: a warning issued by the Surgeon General
sentences.chinese: （美国）卫生局局长发出的警告

detailed_translations.chinese: 发行； 分发， 发出
detailed_translations.english: to officially make a statement, give an order, warning etc
a subject or problem that is often discussed or argued about, especially a social or political matter that affects the interests of a lot of people

name: step
trans: A step is one movement of the foot when walking or running.

sentences.english: a video of baby’s first steps
sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.english: He took one step and fell.
sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.english: I had to retrace my steps (= go back the way I came ) several times before I found the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.english: This is the first step in reforming the welfare system.
sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.english: Jenny sat on the step in front of the house, waiting.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.english: I accidentally stepped in a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心踩进了水坑。

detailed_translations.english: the movement you make when you put one foot in front of or behind the other when walking
to bring your foot down on something

name: cycle
trans: A cycle is a series of events that repeat in a particular order.

sentences.english: a woman’s menstrual cycle
sentences.chinese: 女性的月经周期

detailed_translations.chinese: 自行车、 摩托车； 循环
detailed_translations.english: a number of related events that happen again and again in the same order

name: face
trans: A face is the front part of a person's head, where their eyes, nose, and mouth are.

sentences.english: She had a beautiful face.
sentences.chinese: 她面容秀美。

sentences.english: Her face was white with fear.
sentences.chinese: 她吓得脸煞白。

sentences.english: A big smile spread across his face.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸上绽开了灿烂笑容。

sentences.english: I felt like punching him in the face.
sentences.chinese: 我真想给他脸上来一拳。

sentences.english: The birds build their nests in the rock face.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟在岩壁上筑巢。

detailed_translations.english: the front part of your head, where your eyes, nose, and mouth are

name: item
trans: An item is a thing or object.

sentences.english: He opened the cardboard box and took out each item.
sentences.chinese: 他打开纸板箱把里面的物品一一拿出来。

sentences.english: The store is having a sale on furniture and household items.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店正在减价出售家具和家居用品。

sentences.english: luxury items such as exotic spices and perfumes
sentences.chinese: 异国香料和香水之类的奢侈品

sentences.english: The original 1965 bottle is now a collector’s item (= one of a set of objects people like to collect because they are interesting or valuable ).
sentences.chinese: 这瓶1965年生产的原装酒现在是收藏品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔尤指清单上、一群或一组事物中的〕一项，一件，一条
detailed_translations.english: a single thing, especially one thing in a list, group, or set of things

name: metal
trans: Metal is a hard and shiny material that is used to make many things, such as cars and buildings.

sentences.english: The gate is made of metal.
sentences.chinese: 这扇大门是用金属做成的。

sentences.english: a small black metal box
sentences.chinese: 一个黑色的金属小盒子

sentences.english: They traded in gold and other precious metals (= valuable metals used especially for making jewellery ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们做黄金和其他贵金属的交易。

sentences.english: The old trucks were sold as scrap metal (= old metal that is melted and used again ) .
sentences.chinese: 这些旧卡车被当作金属废料卖掉了。

detailed_translations.english: a hard, usually shiny substance such as iron, gold, or steel

name: paint
trans: Paint is a liquid that is used to color or decorate things.

sentences.english: The ceiling needs painting.
sentences.chinese: 天花板需要粉刷了。

sentences.english: brightly paintedhouses
sentences.chinese: 粉刷得很亮丽的房屋

sentences.english: The living room was painted in pastel shades of pink and blue.
sentences.chinese: 起居室被漆成淡雅的粉色和蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface
to make a picture, design etc using paint

name: review
trans: A review is an evaluation or assessment of something, such as a product or service.

sentences.english: The government will review the situation later in the year.
sentences.chinese: 政府将在今年晚些时候对形势重新加以研究。

sentences.english: The decision will be reviewed by the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 这个判决将由最高法院复核。

sentences.english: The team manager’s position will be reviewed at the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 球队主教练的人选将在赛季末重新考虑。

sentences.english: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully examine or consider sth again, especially so that you can decide if it is necessary to make changes
(North Amercian English) a lesson in which you look again at sth you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

name: room
trans: A room is a space within a building that is enclosed by walls and used for a particular purpose.

sentences.english: I looked around the room.
sentences.chinese: 我四下看了看房间。

sentences.english: She nodded toward a man who was standing across the room (= on the other side of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 她朝站在屋子另一头的一个男人点点头。

sentences.english: Someone was laughing in the next room (= the one beside the one you are in ) .
sentences.chinese: 隔壁房间有人在笑。

sentences.english: Here’s your key - room 348.
sentences.chinese: 这是你的钥匙——348号房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 房间；空间；余地；机会；房间里所有的人
detailed_translations.english: a part of the inside of a building that has its own walls, floor, and ceiling

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…提供住处；租房，合住；投宿，住宿；留…住宿
detailed_translations.english: to rent and live in a room somewhere

name: screen
trans: A screen is a flat surface that displays images or text, such as on a computer or television.

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

name: structure
trans: A structure is something that is built, such as a building or bridge.

sentences.english: challenges to the existing power structure
sentences.chinese: 对现有权力结构的挑战

sentences.english: A new management structure has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 已推行一种新的管理结构。

sentences.english: molecular structures
sentences.chinese: 分子结构

detailed_translations.english: the way in which the parts of something are connected with each other and form a whole, or the thing that these parts make up

name: view
trans: A view is what can be seen from a particular place or position.

sentences.english: an opportunity to view the film before it goes on general release
sentences.chinese: 在影片公映之前观影的机会

detailed_translations.english: to think about something or someone in a particular way

name: account
trans: An account is a record or report of financial transactions or other events.

sentences.english: My salary is paid into my bank account.
sentences.chinese: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.english: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.chinese: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.english: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out

name: ball
trans: A ball is a round object that can be thrown, kicked, or hit in a game or sport.

sentences.english: a tennis/golf/cricket etc ball
sentences.chinese: 网球/高尔夫球/板球等

sentences.english: Shape the dough into balls
sentences.chinese: 把面团搓成丸子。

sentences.english: The air of the ball began to hum.
sentences.chinese: 舞会的气氛开始活跃起来了。

detailed_translations.english: a round object that is thrown, kicked, or hit in a game or sport

name: discipline
trans: Discipline is a set of rules or a way of behaving that is expected and enforced.

sentences.english: Martial arts teach respect, discipline, and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 武术能教人尊重他人、遵守纪律并且相互合作。

sentences.english: Learning poetry is a good discipline for the memory.
sentences.chinese: 背诗是训练记忆力的一种好方法。

sentences.english: Different cultures have different ways of disciplining their children.
sentences.chinese: 不同的文化有不同的管教孩子的方法。

detailed_translations.english: a way of training someone so that they learn to control their behaviour and obey rules
to teach someone to obey rules and control their behaviour

name: medium
trans: A medium is a substance or material through which something is transmitted or communicated.

sentences.english: Advertising is a powerful medium.
sentences.chinese: 广告是具有强大影响力的传播媒介。

sentences.english: hair of medium length
sentences.chinese: 中等长短的头发

detailed_translations.english: a way of communicating information and news to people, such as newspapers, television etc
of middle size, level, or amount

name: share
trans: A share is a portion or part of something that is divided among a group or individuals.

sentences.english: As a kid he’d never share his toys.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候从不肯与人分享他的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or use something that belongs to you
one of the equal parts into which the  ownership  of a company is divided

name: balance
trans: Balance is a state of equilibrium or stability, where things are equal and in the right proportion.

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

name: bit
trans: A bit is a small amount or a piece of something.

sentences.english: He’s taken the engine to bits .
sentences.chinese: 他把发动机拆开了。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of something

name: black
trans: Black is a color that is the darkest possible shade, the opposite of white.

sentences.english: a black evening dress
sentences.chinese: 黑色晚礼服

sentences.english: It was still pitch black (= very dark ) out.
sentences.chinese: 外面依然一片漆黑。

detailed_translations.english: having the darkest colour, like coal or night

name: bottom
trans: Bottom is the lowest or deepest part of something.

sentences.english: Can you hold the bottom of the ladder for me?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我扶住梯子底部好吗？

detailed_translations.english: the lowest part of something

name: choice
trans: A choice is a decision or selection between two or more options.

sentences.english: I think London was a good choice as a venue.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得伦敦是个很好的选址。

sentences.english: choice steak
sentences.chinese: 上等牛排

detailed_translations.english: the person or thing that someone chooses
(especially of food) of very good quality

name: gift
trans: A gift is something given to someone as a present or gesture of goodwill.

sentences.english: The earrings were a gift from my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 这副耳环是我姑姑送给我的礼物。

sentences.english: The clock was given as a retirement gift when he left the police.
sentences.chinese: 这个钟表是他退休离开警局时收到的礼物。

sentences.english: expensive wedding gifts
sentences.chinese: 昂贵的结婚礼物

sentences.english: Enjoy a free gift with any purchase of $20 or more.
sentences.chinese: 购物满20美元奉送礼品一份。

sentences.english: This excellent cookbook would make an ideal gift for anyone just going away to college.
sentences.chinese: 这本精美的烹饪书送给要离家上大学的人是很好的礼物。

sentences.english: a gift for languages
sentences.chinese: 语言天赋

detailed_translations.english: something that you give someone, for example to thank them or because you like them, especially on a special occasion

name: impact
trans: Impact is the effect or influence that something has on a situation or person.

sentences.english: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.chinese: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响， 作用， 冲击
detailed_translations.english: to have an important or noticeable effect on someone or something
the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something

name: machine
trans: A machine is a mechanical device that is used to perform tasks, such as lifting or cutting.

sentences.english: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

name: shape
trans: Shape refers to the physical form or appearance of an object.

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

name: tool
trans: A tool is a device or implement used to perform a specific task.

sentences.english: I don’t have the right tools to start fiddling around with the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我没有合适的工具来摆弄发动机。

sentences.english: a shop selling garden tools
sentences.chinese: 出售园艺工具的商店

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用工具；用机床装备工厂

name: wind
trans: Wind is the natural movement of air in the atmosphere.

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

name: address
trans: Address can refer to the location of a person or place, or the way in which a person speaks to an audience.

detailed_translations.english: if you address a problem, you start trying to solve it

name: average
trans: Average is a measure of central tendency, calculated by adding a group of numbers and dividing by the total number of values.

sentences.english: The average American has not even thought about next year’s election.
sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.english: In an average week I drive about 250 miles.
sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

detailed_translations.english: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

name: career
trans: Career refers to a person's profession or occupation, often including a series of jobs or positions within a particular field.

sentences.english: a teaching career
sentences.chinese: 教学事业

sentences.english: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.chinese: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.english: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.chinese: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.english: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.chinese: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

detailed_translations.english: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work, usually involving more responsibility as time passes

name: culture
trans: Culture encompasses the beliefs, customs, practices, and social behavior of a particular group or society.

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

name: morning
trans: Morning refers to the early part of the day, from sunrise until noon.

sentences.english: I hated those cold winter mornings.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌冬天里寒冷的早晨。

sentences.english: I’m not feeling very well this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我觉得不大舒服。

sentences.english: He stayed in bed late on Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 星期日早上他睡到很晚。

sentences.english: She took the early morning train.
sentences.chinese: 她搭乘了一大早的火车。

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the day, from when the sun rises until 12 o’clock in the middle of the day

name: pot
trans: A pot is a container, typically made of clay or metal, used for cooking or storing food or liquids.

sentences.english: pots and pans
sentences.chinese: 锅碗瓢盆

sentences.english: a pot of jam
sentences.chinese: 一罐果酱

detailed_translations.english: a deep round container used for cooking things in

name: sign
trans: A sign is a visual indication or signal, often used to convey information or instructions.

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning
to write your signature on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

name: table
trans: A table is a piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, used as a surface for working at, eating from, or on which to place things.

sentences.english: The food was served on long tables.
sentences.chinese: 食物放在长餐桌上供应。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with a flat top supported by legs
to leave a bill etc to be discussed or dealt with in the future

name: task
trans: A task is a specific job or assignment that needs to be completed.

sentences.english: Sara had the task of preparing the agenda for meetings.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.english: I was given the task of building a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.english: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.english: He soon realized the scale of the task he had undertaken .
sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.english: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.english: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.english: They have the unenviable task of supervising the most dangerous prison in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.english: Volunteers had the thankless task of distributing campaign leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.english: Trying to bring up a small daughter on your own is no easy task .
sentences.chinese: 独自抚养年幼的女儿不是件轻而易举的事。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that must be done, especially one that is difficult or unpleasant or that must be done regularly

name: condition
trans: A condition is the state of something, often referring to its physical, mental, or emotional state.

sentences.english: Profits increased by £1.5m, despite the difficult economic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the state that something is in, especially how good or bad its physical state is

name: contact
trans: Contact refers to communication or interaction between two or more people or things.

sentences.english: The town is cut off from contact with the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 小镇与外界的联系被切断了。

sentences.english: Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any queries.
sentences.chinese: 你如果有任何疑问，尽管和我联系。

detailed_translations.english: communication with a person, organization, country etc
to write to or telephone someone

name: credit
trans: Credit refers to the ability to borrow money or receive goods or services with the promise of future payment.

sentences.english: We found his statement hard to credit.
sentences.chinese: 我们觉得他的说法令人难以信服。

sentences.english: The witness’s story gained credit with the jury.
sentences.chinese: 证人的陈述被陪审团采信了。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true
the belief that something is true or correct

name: egg
trans: An egg is a reproductive cell produced by female animals, typically containing nutrients to support the growth of a developing embryo.

sentences.english: Blackbirds lay their eggs in March.
sentences.chinese: 乌鸫在3月产蛋。

sentences.english: an ostrich egg
sentences.chinese: 鸵鸟蛋

sentences.english: The eggs hatch (= break open to allow the baby out ) in 26 days.
sentences.chinese: 这些蛋要26天才能孵化。

sentences.english: Joe always has bacon and egg for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 乔早餐总是吃熏肉加蛋。

detailed_translations.english: a round object with a hard surface, that contains a baby bird, snake, insect etc and which is produced by a female bird, snake, insect etc

name: hope
trans: Hope is a feeling of optimism or expectation for a positive outcome in the future.

sentences.english: I do hope everything goes well.
sentences.chinese: 我真心希望一切顺利。

sentences.english: It was hoped that the job would be filled by a local person.
sentences.chinese: 希望该职位由当地人来担任。

sentences.english: Let’s just hope someone finds her bag.
sentences.chinese: 希望有人找到她的提包。

sentences.english: I hope to God I haven’t left the car window open.
sentences.chinese: 但愿我没有忘记关车窗。

sentences.english: When I first arrived in New York, I was full of hope for the future.
sentences.chinese: 我初到纽约时，对未来充满希望。

detailed_translations.english: to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
a feeling of wanting something to happen or be true and believing that it is possible or likely

name: ice
trans: Ice is a solid form of water, typically formed by freezing.

name: network
trans: A network is a system of interconnected elements, such as computers, people, or organizations.

sentences.english: Hungary’s telephone network
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利的电话网

sentences.english: a high-speed European rail network
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的高速铁路网

sentences.english: the network of blood vessels in the body
sentences.chinese: 人体内的血管网

detailed_translations.english: a system of lines, tubes, wires, roads etc that cross each other and are connected to each other

name: north
trans: North is the direction that points toward the Earth's North Pole.

sentences.english: Which way is north?
sentences.chinese: 哪边是北？

sentences.english: He lives in North Wales.
sentences.chinese: 他住在威尔士北部。

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the top of a map of the world, above the Equator. It is on the left if you are facing the rising sun
in the north or facing the north

name: square
trans: Square refers to a shape with four equal sides and four 90-degree angles.

sentences.english: First of all, draw a square.
sentences.chinese: 首先，画一个正方形。

sentences.english: She lives in Hanover Square.
sentences.chinese: 她住在汉诺威广场。

detailed_translations.english: a shape with four straight equal sides with 90˚ angles at the corners

name: attempt
trans: An attempt is an effort to do something, often with the intention of succeeding.

sentences.english: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.chinese: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尝试， 试图， 努力
detailed_translations.english: to try to do something, especially something difficult

name: date
trans: A date is a specific day or time period, often used to indicate when an event occurred or when something is scheduled to happen.

sentences.english: The date on the letter was 30th August 1962.
sentences.chinese: 信上的日期是1962年8月30日。

sentences.english: What’s today’s date?
sentences.chinese: 今天几号？

sentences.english: Make sure you sign and date it at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在底下签上姓名和日期。

detailed_translations.english: a particular day of the month or year, especially shown by a number
to write or print the date on something

name: effect
trans: An effect is the result or consequence of a particular action or event.

sentences.english: the long-term effects of the drug
sentences.chinese: 这种毒品的长期影响

sentences.english: I could feel the effects of the thin mountain air.
sentences.chinese: 我能感觉到山上稀薄空气产生的影响。

sentences.english: This ingredient also has the effect of making your skin look younger.
sentences.chinese: 这种成分还有使皮肤看上去更年轻的效果。

sentences.english: A system failure has a knock-on effect throughout the whole hotel.
sentences.chinese: 系统故障会给整个酒店带来连锁反应。

sentences.english: the cumulative effect of human activities on the global environment
sentences.chinese: 人类活动对全球环境日积月累的影响

sentences.english: A much lower dose of the painkiller can still produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 大量减少该止痛药的服用剂量依然能产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: In mental illness, there is a complex relationship between cause and effect.
sentences.chinese: 精神疾病有复杂的因果关系。

detailed_translations.english: a change that is caused by an event, action etc

name: link
trans: A link is a connection between two or more things, often used in reference to a hyperlink on a website that directs the user to another web page.

sentences.english: He walked with her, linking arms (= putting his arm around her arm ).
sentences.chinese: 他与她挽臂同行。

detailed_translations.english: to join two things by putting one through the other
each ring of a chain

name: post
trans: A post is a message or piece of information that is published online or on a notice board.

sentences.english: a fence post
sentences.chinese: 篱笆桩

sentences.english: The exam results were posted on the bulletin board yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 考试成绩昨天在布告板上贴出来了。

detailed_translations.english: a strong upright piece of wood, metal etc that is fixed into the ground, especially to support something
to put up a public notice about something on a wall or notice board

name: star
trans: A star is a luminous celestial body visible in the sky at night, which is made up of hot gases and emits its own light.

sentences.english: I lay on my back and looked up at the stars.
sentences.chinese: 我仰卧着看天上的星星。

sentences.english: The sky was filled with stars.
sentences.chinese: 满天繁星。

sentences.english: The stars were shining .
sentences.chinese: 群星闪烁。

sentences.english: The stars were all out (= they were shining ) .
sentences.chinese: 星耀天空。

sentences.english: The stars were twinkling overhead (= shining and quickly changing from bright to faint ) .
sentences.chinese: 头顶上星星闪烁。

detailed_translations.english: a large ball of burning gas in space that can be seen at night as a point of light in the sky

detailed_translations.chinese: 以星状物装饰,变成演员

name: voice
trans: A voice is the sound made by a person when they speak or sing.

sentences.english: He recognized her voice instantly.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻听出了她的声音。

sentences.english: I could hear angry voices.
sentences.chinese: 我听到了愤怒的声音。

detailed_translations.english: the sounds that you make when you speak, or the ability to make these sounds
to tell people your opinions or feelings about a particular subject

name: capital
trans: Capital is a city that serves as the seat of government for a country or state, or it can refer to wealth and resources that can be used to create more wealth.

sentences.english: capital investments
sentences.chinese: 资本投资

detailed_translations.english: relating to money that you use to start a business or to make more money

name: challenge
trans: A challenge is a task or problem that requires effort, skill, or courage to overcome.

sentences.english: They threw down the challenge that he couldn’t wash 40 cars in one hour (= invited him to try to do it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑战，邀请比赛；艰巨的任务；怀疑，质问
detailed_translations.english: something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 公然反抗； 向…挑战； 对…质疑
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal

name: friend
trans: A friend is a person with whom one has a bond of mutual affection and trust.

sentences.english: Jerry, this is my friend Sue.
sentences.chinese: 杰里，这是我的朋友休。

sentences.english: She’s always out with her friends.
sentences.chinese: 她常同朋友们一起出去。

sentences.english: One of her closest friends died at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她的一位密友周末过世了。

sentences.english: I met Jim through a friend.
sentences.chinese: 经一位朋友介绍，我认识了吉姆。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you know and like very much and enjoy spending time with

name: self
trans: The self refers to an individual's consciousness or identity, or it can refer to the totality of a person's being.

sentences.english: a child’s developing sense of self
sentences.chinese: 儿童逐渐形成的自我意识

detailed_translations.english: the type of person you are, your character, your typical behaviour etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使自花授精；使近亲繁殖

name: shot
trans: A shot is a small amount of a liquid substance, such as a medication or alcoholic beverage, or it can refer to a single discharge of a gun or firearm.

sentences.english: In the opening shot, we see Travolta’s feet walking down the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 在开场的镜头中，我们看到特拉沃尔塔的脚在人行道上行走。

detailed_translations.english: the view of something in a film or television programme that is produced by having the camera in a particular position

detailed_translations.chinese: 用尽的；破旧的；杂色的，闪光的
detailed_translations.english: in bad condition because of being used too much or treated badly

detailed_translations.chinese: 射击（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

name: brush
trans: A brush is a tool with bristles or fibers used for cleaning, grooming, or painting.

sentences.english: a scrubbing brush
sentences.chinese: 硬毛刷，板刷

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use for cleaning, painting, making your hair tidy etc, made with a lot of hairs,  bristle s  , or thin pieces of plastic, fastened to a handle

name: couple
trans: A couple is a pair of people or things that are joined or associated with each other in some way.

sentences.english: a newly married couple
sentences.chinese: 一对新婚夫妇

sentences.english: the couple next door
sentences.chinese: 隔壁的那对夫妇

detailed_translations.english: two people who are married or having a sexual or romantic relationship

name: debate
trans: A debate is a formal discussion or argument between people with different opinions or beliefs on a particular topic.

sentences.english: the gun-control debate in the US
sentences.chinese: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.english: The new drug has become the subject of heated debate within the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.english: There was much lively debate about whether women should spend more time in the home.
sentences.chinese: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.english: A fierce debate raged over which artist’s work should be chosen for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.english: The issue will be debated on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在星期二讨论。

detailed_translations.english: discussion of a particular subject that often continues for a long time and in which people express different opinions
to discuss a subject formally when you are trying to make a decision or find a solution

name: exit
trans: An exit is a way out of a place, such as a building or vehicle.

sentences.english: We made for the nearest exit.
sentences.chinese: 我们走向最近的出口。

sentences.english: an exit door
sentences.chinese: 出口门

sentences.english: Two men were blocking her exit.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人挡住了她出去的路。

detailed_translations.english: a door or space through which you can leave a public room, building etc
to leave a place

name: front
trans: The front is the part of something that faces forward or is the most visible, or it can refer to the area or position directly ahead of someone or something.

sentences.english: Two of his front teeth had been knocked out.
sentences.chinese: 他有两颗门牙被打落了。

sentences.english: the front cover of ‘Hello!’ magazine
sentences.chinese: 《Hello!》杂志的封面

sentences.english: the front wheel of his bicycle
sentences.chinese: 他自行车的前轮

sentences.english: the dog’s front legs
sentences.chinese: 狗的前腿

sentences.english: Ricky stepped forward to the front of the stage and began to sing.
sentences.chinese: 里基走到舞台的最前面，开始唱了起来。

detailed_translations.english: at, on, or in the front of something
the part of something that is furthest forward in the direction that it is facing or moving

name: function
trans: A function is a purpose or task that something is designed or intended to perform, or it can refer to a mathematical relationship between two variables.

sentences.english: Her legs have now ceased to function .
sentences.chinese: 她的双腿现在已经丧失正常功能了。

sentences.english: You know I can’t function (= cannot perform normal activities ) without a coffee in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，我早上不喝杯咖啡就无法工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作， 运行； 起作用
detailed_translations.english: to work in the correct or intended way

detailed_translations.chinese: 功能，职务；【数】函数；重大聚会
detailed_translations.english: the purpose that something has, or the job that someone or something does

name: lack
trans: Lack is the absence or shortage of something that is needed or desired.

sentences.english: Alex’s real problem is that he lacks confidence.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯的真正问题是缺乏信心。

detailed_translations.english: to not have something that you need, or not have enough of it

name: living
trans: Living refers to the condition or state of being alive or in existence, or it can refer to the means of sustaining life, such as food and shelter.

sentences.english: He’s one of the greatest living composers.
sentences.chinese: 他是仍然健在的最伟大的作曲家之一。

sentences.english: The sun affects all living things (= people, animals, and plants ).
sentences.chinese: 太阳与一切生物息息相关。

sentences.english: a living language
sentences.chinese: 活语言，仍在使用的语言

sentences.english: It’s not a great job, but it’s a living.
sentences.chinese: 这不是什么了不起的工作，不过是一种生计。

detailed_translations.english: alive now
the way that you earn money or the money that you earn

name: plant
trans: A plant is a living organism that is typically photosynthetic, has roots, stems, and leaves, and is able to reproduce.

sentences.english: Don’t forget to water the plants.
sentences.chinese: 别忘记给植物浇水。

sentences.english: a huge chemical plant
sentences.chinese: 一座大型化工厂

sentences.english: Residents have helped us plant trees.
sentences.chinese: 居民们帮助我们种了树。

detailed_translations.english: a living thing that has leaves and roots and grows in earth, especially one that is smaller than a tree
to put plants or seeds in the ground to grow

name: plastic
trans: Plastic is a synthetic material made from polymers that can be molded into various shapes and used for a wide range of applications.

sentences.english: a plastic spoon
sentences.chinese: 塑料汤匙

sentences.english: plastic bags
sentences.chinese: 塑料袋

detailed_translations.english: made of plastic

name: spot
trans: A spot is a small area or place, or it can refer to a stain or blemish on a surface.

sentences.english: a nice quiet spot on the beach
sentences.chinese: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.english: I chose a spot well away from the road.
sentences.chinese: 我选了一个远离马路的地点。

detailed_translations.english: a particular place or area, especially a pleasant place where you spend time

detailed_translations.chinese: 认出， 发现； 玷污
detailed_translations.english: to notice someone or something, especially when they are difficult to see or recognize

name: summer
trans: Summer is the warmest season of the year, typically occurring between spring and autumn, characterized by longer days and shorter nights.

sentences.english: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.english: Food must be refrigerated in summer.
sentences.chinese: 食物在夏天必须加以冷藏。

sentences.english: After a summer here the poorest sheep and cattle grow strong and fat.
sentences.chinese: 经过一个夏天， 连最差的牛羊在这里也长得又肥又壮了。

name: taste
trans: Taste is the sensation of flavor perceived in the mouth when eating or drinking something, or it can refer to a person's preference or liking for something.

sentences.english: Some birds have a highly developed sense of taste.
sentences.chinese: 有些鸟的味觉很发达。

sentences.english: She has such good taste.
sentences.chinese: 她的品位很高雅。

detailed_translations.english: the sense by which you know one food from another

name: theme
trans: A theme is a subject or topic that is repeated or developed throughout a piece of literature, art, or music, or it can refer to the overall style or tone of something.

sentences.english: The book’s theme is the conflict between love and duty.
sentences.chinese: 本书的主题是爱与责任之间的冲突。

sentences.english: Freia’s theme in Wagner’s opera
sentences.chinese: 瓦格纳歌剧中的弗莱雅主旋律

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目；主题；主旋律；（句子的）主位；词干
detailed_translations.english: the main subject or idea in a piece of writing, speech, film etc

name: track
trans: A track is a path or route for vehicles, or it can refer to a recorded sequence of sound or music.

sentences.english: Police have been tracking the four criminals all over Central America.
sentences.chinese: 警方一直在中美洲到处追捕这四名罪犯。

detailed_translations.english: to search for a person or animal by following the marks they leave behind them on the ground, their smell etc
a line of marks left on the ground by a moving person, animal, or vehicle

name: wing
trans: A wing is a flat or curved surface on an aircraft that produces lift and enables it to fly, or it can refer to the side of a building or other structure that protrudes outward.

sentences.english: a butterfly with beautiful markings on its wings
sentences.chinese: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.english: The pheasant flapped its wings vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts of a bird’s or insect’s body that it uses for flying
to fly somewhere

name: brain
trans: The brain is the organ in the head that controls the body's functions and enables conscious thought, perception, and emotion.

sentences.english: Messages from the brain are carried by the central nervous system.
sentences.chinese: 大脑发出的信息是通过中枢神经系统传递的。

sentences.english: the chemistry of the brain
sentences.chinese: 大脑的化学性质

sentences.english: the human brain
sentences.chinese: 人脑

sentences.english: She died of a brain tumour.
sentences.chinese: 她死于脑瘤。

sentences.english: The job requires brains.
sentences.chinese: 做这工作需要头脑。

detailed_translations.english: the organ inside your head that controls how you think, feel, and move

name: button
trans: A button is a small object that you press to make something happen.

sentences.english: small pearl buttons
sentences.chinese: 小的珍珠纽扣

sentences.english: A button was missing from his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的衬衫上掉了一颗纽扣。

sentences.english: She undid (=  unfastened  ) the buttons of her blouse.
sentences.chinese: 她解开衬衫的纽扣。

detailed_translations.english: a small round flat object on your shirt, coat etc that you pass through a hole to fasten it
to fasten clothes with buttons, or to be fastened with buttons

name: click
trans: To click is to press a button on a computer mouse or other device.

sentences.english: The door clicked shut behind me.
sentences.chinese: 门在我身后咔嗒一声关上了。

sentences.english: Mother clicked her tongue (= made a short sound to show disapproval ) and sighed.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈咂咂嘴，叹了口气。

sentences.english: Edmund clicked his fingers (= made a short sound to get someone’s attention ) for John to follow him.
sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙弹了个响指示意约翰跟着他。

sentences.english: Vogel clicked his heels (= hit the heels of his shoes together ) and bowed.
sentences.chinese: 沃格尔咔嗒一声并拢脚跟，鞠了个躬。

sentences.english: Twist the lever and the gears click into place .
sentences.chinese: 转动变速杆，排挡就咔嗒一声到位了。

sentences.english: You can check your e-mail with a click of your mouse.
sentences.chinese: 通过鼠标的一点你就能查电子邮件。

detailed_translations.english: to make a short hard sound, or make something produce this sound
Click is also a noun

name: desire
trans: To desire is to want something strongly.

sentences.english: The hotel has everything you could possibly desire .
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店里你想要的东西应有尽有。

sentences.english: Add lemon juice if desired .
sentences.chinese: 需要的话加点柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much
a strong hope or wish

name: foot
trans: A foot is a body part at the bottom of your leg that you use to walk or run.

sentences.english: My foot hurts.
sentences.chinese: 我脚痛。

sentences.english: I had blisters on the soles of my feet .
sentences.chinese: 我的脚底起泡了。

sentences.english: I dropped a glass earlier, so don’t walk around in bare feet .
sentences.chinese: 我刚才打破了一个玻璃杯，所以不要光着脚到处走。

sentences.english: The vet examined the horse’s hind feet .
sentences.chinese: 兽医检查了马的后蹄。

sentences.english: He walked to the foot of the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他走到楼梯下面。

sentences.english: He’s six feet tall , with blonde hair.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，一头金发。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body that you stand on and walk on

name: gas
trans: Gas is a type of fuel that is used to power vehicles and machines.

sentences.english: hydrogen gas
sentences.chinese: 氢气

sentences.english: Can you light the gas for me?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我点燃煤气好吗？

sentences.english: I probably spend over 200 a month on gas.
sentences.chinese: 我一个月大概要花200多美元汽油钱。

detailed_translations.english: a substance such as air, which is not solid or liquid, and usually cannot be seen

name: influence
trans: To influence is to have an effect on someone or something.

sentences.english: He used his influence to get his son into medical school.
sentences.chinese: 他利用权势把儿子弄进了医学院。

sentences.english: He denies exerting any political influence over them.
sentences.chinese: 他否认曾向他们施加过政治影响。

detailed_translations.english: the power to make other people agree with your opinions or do what you want

name: notice
trans: To notice is to become aware of something with your senses or your mind.

sentences.english: He noticed a woman in a black dress sitting across from him.
sentences.chinese: 他看到有位黑衣女子坐在他的对面。

sentences.english: I didn’t notice any smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我没注意到有烟。

sentences.english: Have you noticed any change in him?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到他有什么变化了吗？

sentences.english: I waved but they took no notice.
sentences.chinese: 我挥了挥手，可是他们没有注意到。

sentences.english: Firefighters were prepared to rush out at a moment’s notice.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员准备着随时出动。

detailed_translations.english: if you notice something or someone, you realize that they exist, especially because you can see, hear, or feel them
when you notice or pay attention to someone or something

name: rain
trans: Rain is water that falls from the sky when it is cloudy and wet outside.

sentences.english: a night of wind and rain
sentences.chinese: 风雨交加的夜晚

sentences.english: There will be heavy rain in most parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国大部分地区将有大雨。

sentences.english: Outside it was still raining.
sentences.chinese: 外面仍在下雨。

detailed_translations.english: water that falls in small drops from clouds in the sky
if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

name: wall
trans: A wall is a vertical structure that divides or surrounds an area.

sentences.english: the Great Wall of China
sentences.chinese: 中国的长城

sentences.english: We climbed over the wall into the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 我们翻墙进了果园。

detailed_translations.english: an upright flat structure made of stone or brick, that divides one area from another or surrounds an area

name: base
trans: A base is the bottom or foundation of something.

sentences.english: India has a good scientific research base.
sentences.chinese: 印度有良好的科研基础。

detailed_translations.english: the most important part of something, from which new ideas develop
not having good moral principles
to have your main place of work, business etc in a particular place

name: damage
trans: Damage is harm or injury to something or someone.

sentences.english: insects that damage crops
sentences.chinese: 破坏庄稼的昆虫

sentences.english: There may be permanent brain damage.
sentences.chinese: 可能有永久性脑损伤。

detailed_translations.english: to cause physical harm to something or to part of someone’s body
physical harm that is done to something or to a part of someone’s body, so that it is broken or injured

name: distance
trans: Distance is the amount of space between two objects or places.

sentences.english: Measure the distance between the two points.
sentences.chinese: 量出两点之间的距离。

sentences.english: The cottage is some distance (= quite a long distance ) from the road.
sentences.chinese: 小屋离开大路有些距离。

sentences.english: Church bells rang in the distance (= they were far away ) .
sentences.chinese: 远处教堂的钟声响起。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space between two places or things

name: feeling
trans: A feeling is an emotion or sensation that you experience.

sentences.english: Knowing we’d won was a wonderful feeling.
sentences.chinese: 得知我们赢了，感觉真好。

sentences.english: He’s considerate of other people’s feelings.
sentences.chinese: 他很顾及他人的感情。

detailed_translations.english: an emotion that you feel, such as anger, sadness, or happiness

name: pair
trans: A pair is two objects of the same kind that are meant to be used together.

sentences.english: earrings, £5 a pair
sentences.chinese: 耳环，5英镑一副

sentences.english: We were each paired with a newcomer to help with training.
sentences.chinese: 我们每个人都和一名新手组对，帮助他们训练。

detailed_translations.english: two things of the same type that are used together
to put people or things into groups of two, or to form groups of two

name: savings
trans: Savings are money that you set aside and don't spend.

sentences.english: You can enjoy a year's membership for just $28 – a saving of $7 off the regular rate.
sentences.chinese: 你只需花$28就可以享受一年的会员资格–比正常会费节省了$7。

detailed_translations.chinese: 储蓄；存款；救助；节省物（saving的复数形式）
detailed_translations.english: A saving is a reduction in the amount of time or money that is used or needed

name: staff
trans: Staff are people who work for an organization or business.

sentences.english: The staff were very good.
sentences.chinese: 员工们都很棒。

sentences.english: 10 staff were allocated to the task.
sentences.chinese: 10名员工被分派做这项任务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全体职员，员工；工作人员；参谋
detailed_translations.english: the people who work for an organization

name: sugar
trans: Sugar is a sweet substance that is used to sweeten food and drinks.

sentences.english: Do you take sugar in your coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你的咖啡加糖吗？

detailed_translations.english: a sweet white or brown substance that is obtained from plants and used to make food and drinks sweet
to add sugar or cover something with sugar

name: target
trans: A target is a goal or objective that someone wants to achieve.

sentences.english: There is no target date for completion of the new project.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.english: The government may fail to meet (= achieve ) its target of recycling 25% of domestic waste.
sentences.chinese: 政府可能达不到回收利用25%的生活垃圾的目标。

sentences.english: Jiang set annual growth targets of 8–9%.
sentences.chinese: 江确定了8%至9%的年增长目标。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time
to make something have an effect on a particular limited group or area

name: text
trans: A text is a written or printed piece of language that communicates information or ideas.

sentences.english: a chemistry text
sentences.chinese: 化学课本

detailed_translations.english: a textbook
to send someone a written message on a  mobile phone

name: animal
trans: An animal is a living organism that is not a plant and has the ability to move around and respond to its environment.

sentences.english: furry little animals
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的小动物

sentences.english: The cosmetics have not been tested on animals.
sentences.chinese: 这些化妆品没有进行过动物试验。

sentences.english: Beth is an animal lover (=  someone who likes animals  ) .
sentences.chinese: 贝丝是个喜欢动物的人。

detailed_translations.english: a living creature such as a dog or cat, that is not an insect, plant, bird, fish, or person
human feelings, desires etc that are connected with sex, food, and other basic needs

name: author
trans: An author is a person who writes books, articles, or other written works.

sentences.english: Nothomb is a Belgian author.
sentences.chinese: 诺东是位比利时作家。

sentences.english: It’s clear that the author is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 显然，这位作者是女性。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has written a book

name: budget
trans: A budget is a plan for how to spend money over a certain period of time.

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

name: discount
trans: A discount is a reduction in the price of something.

sentences.english: They are often available at a discount.
sentences.chinese: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

sentences.english: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.chinese: 这已经迫使多家航空公司对机票大幅打折以刺激需求。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in the usual price of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…打折扣； 不信； 漠视， 低估
detailed_translations.english: If a shop or company discounts an amount or percentage from something that they are selling, they take the amount or percentage off the usual price

name: file
trans: A file is a collection of information or data that is stored on a computer or other electronic device.

sentences.english: We will keep your details on file (= store them for later use ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你的详细资料存档。

sentences.english: The contracts are filed alphabetically.
sentences.chinese: 这些合同是按字母顺序归档的。

detailed_translations.english: a set of papers, records etc that contain information about a particular person or subject
to keep papers, documents etc in a particular place so that you can find them easily

name: ground
trans: The ground is the solid surface of the earth that people and things stand on.

sentences.english: I found her lying on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她躺在地上。

sentences.english: a football/recreation/sports, etc. ground
sentences.chinese: 足球场、娱乐场地、运动场等

sentences.english: There are strong grounds for believing his statement.
sentences.chinese: 有充分的理由可以相信他的话。

sentences.english: ‘You’re under arrest.’ ‘On what grounds?’
sentences.chinese: “你被捕了。”“理由是什么？”

detailed_translations.english: the solid surface of the earth

name: lesson
trans: A lesson is a period of teaching or learning about a particular subject or activity.

sentences.english: piano lessons
sentences.chinese: 钢琴课

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in which someone is taught a particular skill, for example how to play a musical instrument or drive a car

name: minute
trans: A minute is a unit of time that equals 60 seconds.

sentences.english: It takes me ten minutes to walk to work.
sentences.chinese: 我步行上班要用十分钟。

sentences.english: The train arrived at four minutes past eight.
sentences.chinese: 火车于八点零四分到达。

sentences.english: He returned a few minutes later.
sentences.chinese: 几分钟后他回来了。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the car in five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 五分钟后我在车那儿和你见面。

sentences.english: Sam thought for a minute, then smiled at his brother.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆想了一下，然后冲着他的兄弟笑了。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour

name: officer
trans: An officer is a person who has a position of authority in a government, military, or other organization.

sentences.english: a former Cabinet officer
sentences.chinese: 前内阁官员

sentences.english: a commanding officer of the SAS
sentences.chinese: 英国空军特种部队的一名指挥官

detailed_translations.english: someone who is in a position in an organization or the government

name: phase
trans: A phase is a distinct stage in a process of change or development.

sentences.english: a new drug that is in the experimental phase
sentences.chinese: 处于试验阶段的一种新药

sentences.english: It’s just a phase he’s going through.
sentences.chinese: 这只是他要经历的一个阶段。

detailed_translations.english: one of the stages of a process of development or change

name: reference
trans: A reference is a source of information or a mention of someone or something.

sentences.english: Keep their price list on file for future reference (= so that it can be looked at in the future ) ..
sentences.chinese: 将他们的价目表存档，以供日后参考。

sentences.english: There is no direct reference to her own childhood in the novel.
sentences.chinese: 小说里没有直接提及她自己的童年。

detailed_translations.english: the act of looking at sth for information

name: register
trans: To register is to officially sign up for something or to record information.

sentences.english: Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.english: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.english: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

detailed_translations.english: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

name: sky
trans: The sky is the space above the earth that is filled with clouds, stars, and the sun.

sentences.english: The sky grew dark, and a cold rain began to fall.
sentences.chinese: 天色转暗，开始下起冰冷的雨来。

sentences.english: A shooting star sped across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 一颗流星划过天空。

detailed_translations.english: the space above the earth where clouds and the sun and stars appear

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…投向空中；把…挂得过高

name: stage
trans: A stage is a raised platform or area on which actors or performers present a play, concert, or other form of entertainment.

sentences.english: We’re getting to the stage where we hardly ever go out together.
sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

sentences.english: She is on stage for most of the play.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的大部分时间里她都在台上

detailed_translations.english: a particular time or state that something reaches as it grows or develops

name: stick
trans: A stick is a long, thin piece of wood or other material that is used for various purposes.

sentences.english: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.chinese: 一对鼓槌

sentences.english: a measuring stick
sentences.chinese: 量尺

sentences.english: Aunt Lou walks with a stick (= uses a stick to help her walk ) .
sentences.chinese: 卢姑妈走路要拄拐棍。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin piece of wood, plastic etc that you use for a particular purpose
if a pointed object sticks into something, or if you stick it there, it is pushed into it

name: title
trans: A title is a name given to a book, movie, or other work of art.

sentences.english: "Patience and Sarah" was first published in 1969 under the title "A Place for Us."
sentences.chinese: 《耐心与萨拉》于1969年以《我们的地方》为书名首次出版。

sentences.english: Pirandello titled his play "Six Characters in Search of an Author."
sentences.chinese: 皮兰德娄将其戏剧命名为《六个寻找作者的剧中人》。

sentences.english: The single is titled "White Love."
sentences.chinese: 这支单曲名为《白色之恋》。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冠军；标题；头衔；权利；字幕
detailed_translations.english: the name given to a particular book, painting, play etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为
detailed_translations.english: When a writer, composer, or artist titles a work, they give it a name

name: trouble
trans: Trouble is a problem or difficulty that causes inconvenience or distress.

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

name: bowl
trans: A bowl is a round, deep dish used for holding food or liquid.

sentences.english: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 将所有配料放在大碗里搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: Fill the bowl with water.
sentences.chinese: 在碗里装满水。

detailed_translations.english: a wide round container that is open at the top, used to hold liquids, food, flowers etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
detailed_translations.english: to travel along very quickly and smoothly

name: bridge
trans: A bridge is a structure that is built over a river, road, or other obstacle to allow people or vehicles to cross.

sentences.english: He walked back over the railway bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他从铁路桥上走了回去。

sentences.english: They recreate themselves with playing bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们以打桥牌作消遣。

detailed_translations.english: a structure built over a river, road etc that allows people or vehicles to cross from one side to the other

name: campaign
trans: A campaign is a series of planned actions that are intended to achieve a particular goal.

sentences.english: Jones ran a good campaign.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯的活动搞得很成功。

sentences.english: Police have launched a campaign to crack down on drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 警方发起了一场严厉打击毒贩的运动。

detailed_translations.english: a series of actions intended to achieve a particular result relating to politics or business, or a social improvement

name: character
trans: A character is a person or animal in a book, movie, or other work of fiction.

sentences.english: He has a cheerful but quiet character.
sentences.chinese: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.english: Everyone recognizes Disney’s cartoon characters.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.english: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

detailed_translations.english: the particular combination of qualities that makes someone a particular type of person

name: club
trans: A club is a group of people who share a common interest or activity.

sentences.english: Manchester United Football Club
sentences.chinese: 曼联（队）足球俱乐部

sentences.english: Shall we go to a club?
sentences.chinese: 我们去夜总会怎样？

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔职业体育的〕俱乐部；俱乐部；夜总会
detailed_translations.english: a professional organization including the players, managers, and owners of a sports team

name: edge
trans: An edge is the outer or furthest point of something.

sentences.english: Put the eggs in the centre of the dish, with the vegetables and herbs around the edge.
sentences.chinese: 把鸡蛋放在盘子中间，盘边一圈放些蔬菜和香草。

sentences.english: He stood at the water’s edge staring across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 他站在水边，凝视着湖对面。

sentences.english: A leaf was on the ground, curling up at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 地上有一片叶子，叶边卷曲着。

sentences.english: a knife with a sharp edge
sentences.chinese: 刀刃锋利的小刀

detailed_translations.english: the part of an object that is furthest from its centre

name: evidence
trans: Evidence is something that provides proof or support for a claim or theory.

sentences.english: We found further scientific evidence for this theory.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到了进一步证实这种理论的科学根据。

sentences.english: I was asked to give evidence (= to say what I knew, describe what I had seen, etc.)
sentences.chinese: 我被要求出庭作证。

detailed_translations.english: facts or signs that show clearly that something exists or is true

name: fan
trans: A fan is a person who is enthusiastic about a particular sport, hobby, or celebrity.

sentences.english: Groups of football fans began heading towards the ground.
sentences.chinese: 成群结队的球迷开始向球场走去。

detailed_translations.english: someone who likes a particular sport or performing art very much, or who admires a famous person

name: letter
trans: A letter is a written or printed message that is usually sent by mail.

sentences.english: I got a letter from Melanie today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我收到梅拉妮的一封信。

sentences.english: There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 英语字母表有26个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a written or printed message that is usually put in an envelope and sent by mail

name: lock
trans: A lock is a device used to secure a door, gate, or other opening.

sentences.english: I’m sorry, there isn’t a lock on the bathroom door.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，浴室门上没有锁。

sentences.english: The key turned stiffly in the lock.
sentences.chinese: 这把钥匙开锁不灵活。

sentences.english: a bike lock
sentences.chinese: 自行车锁

sentences.english: Did you lock the car?
sentences.chinese: 你把汽车锁好了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a thing that keeps a door, drawer etc fastened and is usually opened with a key or by moving a small metal bar
to fasten something, usually with a key, so that other people cannot open it, or to be fastened like this

name: maximum
trans: Maximum is the highest amount or quantity that is allowed or possible.

sentences.english: The car has a maximum speed of 120 mph.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车的最高时速为120英里。

sentences.english: They made maximum use of the resources available.
sentences.chinese: 他们充分利用可获取的资源。

sentences.english: To get the maximum benefit, do the exercises slowly.
sentences.chinese: 要想获得最佳的效果，这些运动要做得慢一点。

sentences.english: Display the hologram under a strong light for maximum effect.
sentences.chinese: 把立体全息图放在强光下展示以得到最佳效果。

sentences.english: The plant is operating at maximum capacity .
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂正在开足马力生产。

sentences.english: The award will consist of a lump sum to a maximum value of $5,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖学金最高将是5,000美元，一次性给付。

detailed_translations.chinese: 最大的； 最高的； 顶点的
detailed_translations.english: the maximum amount, quantity, speed etc is the largest that is possible or allowed
the largest number or amount that is possible or is allowed

name: novel
trans: A novel is a long work of fiction that tells a story.

sentences.english: a novel by Jane Austen
sentences.chinese: 简·奥斯丁的小说

sentences.english: What a novel idea!.
sentences.chinese: 多么新奇的想法呀！

detailed_translations.english: a long written story in which the characters and events are usually imaginary
not like anything known before, and unusual or interesting

name: option
trans: An option is a choice or possibility that is available.

sentences.english: There are a number of options available.
sentences.chinese: 有多种选择。

sentences.english: He had two options.
sentences.chinese: 他有两种选择。

sentences.english: This was not the only option open to him.
sentences.chinese: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.english: Teenage mothers often have no option but to (= have no other choice except to ) live with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

detailed_translations.chinese: 选择， 选择权， 选择自由； 选择的事物， 选课
detailed_translations.english: a choice you can make in a particular situation

name: pack
trans: To pack is to put things into a bag, box, or other container for storage or transport.

sentences.english: I forgot to pack my razor.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记把剃须刀放入行李包了。

sentences.english: Hundreds of people packed into the mosque.
sentences.chinese: 成百上千的人挤进了清真寺。

sentences.english: Send away for your free information pack today.
sentences.chinese: 今天就来函索取免费资料包吧。

detailed_translations.english: to put things into cases, bags etc ready for a trip somewhere
something wrapped in paper or packed in a box and then sent by post or taken somewhere

name: park
trans: A park is a public place with grass, trees, and often playgrounds or sports fields for people to enjoy.

sentences.english: Let’s go for a walk in the park.
sentences.chinese: 我们去公园散步吧。

sentences.english: a park bench
sentences.chinese: 公园长椅

sentences.english: a flat overlooking Hyde Park
sentences.chinese: 一套可以俯瞰海德公园的公寓

detailed_translations.english: a large open area with grass and trees, especially in a town, where people can walk, play games etc

name: plenty
trans: Plenty means having enough or more than enough of something.

sentences.english: There’s plenty to do and see in New York.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约有很多事可做，很多东西可看。

detailed_translations.english: a large quantity that is enough or more than enough

name: quarter
trans: A quarter is a unit of measurement equal to one-fourth or 25% of something.

sentences.english: It’s about a page and a quarter.
sentences.chinese: 大概是一又四分之一页。

sentences.english: Cut the cake into quarters.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕切成四等份。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in a quarter of an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们一刻钟之后见。

detailed_translations.english: one of four equal parts into which something can be divided

name: skin
trans: Skin is the outer layer that covers the body of a person or animal.

sentences.english: She had thick black hair and smooth dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 她一头浓密的黑发，皮肤黝黑光滑。

sentences.english: The skin on his hands was dry and rough.
sentences.chinese: 他手上的皮肤干燥粗糙。

detailed_translations.english: the natural outer layer of a person’s or animal’s body
to remove the skin from an animal, fruit, or vegetable

name: sort
trans: Sort means to categorize or put things in order based on their similarities or differences.

sentences.english: Most of the victims developed psychological problems of one sort or another (= of various different types ).
sentences.chinese: 大多数受害者都出现了这样那样的心理问题。

sentences.english: They do burgers, pizzas, that sort of thing.
sentences.chinese: 他们供应汉堡包、比萨饼什么的。

sentences.english: The eggs are sorted according to size.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸡蛋是按大小分类的。

detailed_translations.english: a group or class of people, things etc that have similar qualities or features
to put things in a particular order or arrange them in groups according to size, type etc

name: weight
trans: Weight is the measure of how heavy an object is.

sentences.english: The average weight of a baby at birth is just over seven pounds.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.english: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
detailed_translations.english: how heavy something is when you measure it
If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

name: baby
trans: A baby is a young human being who has not yet learned to walk or talk.

sentences.english: Clare is the baby of the family.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔是家里最小的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: a younger child in a family, often the youngest

name: background
trans: Background refers to the part of a scene or picture that is furthest from the viewer, or the circumstances or events that lead up to a particular situation.

sentences.english: Students with a background in chemistry will probably find the course easier.
sentences.chinese: 学过化学的学生可能会觉得这门课程容易些。

sentences.english: It’s important to understand other people, people from different backgrounds .
sentences.chinese: 要理解别人，理解那些来自不同背景的人，这是很重要的。

sentences.english: Do you know anything about his background?
sentences.chinese: 关于他的背景，你知道什么吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 出身背景， 经历； 背景资料； 背景， 底子
detailed_translations.english: someone’s family, education, previous work etc

name: carry
trans: To carry means to hold or support the weight of something and transport it from one place to another.

sentences.english: The morning paper carried a story about demonstrations in New York and Washington D.C.
sentences.chinese: 晨报登载了纽约和华盛顿特区举行示威游行的报道。

sentences.english: The national TV network carries religious programmes.
sentences.chinese: 全国电视网播出宗教节目。

detailed_translations.english: if a newspaper, a television or radio broadcast, or a website carries a piece of news, an advertisement etc, it prints it or broadcasts it

name: dish
trans: A dish is a container, usually with a flat bottom and curved sides, used for serving or cooking food.

sentences.english: a serving dish
sentences.chinese: 上菜用的盘子

sentences.english: an ovenproof dish
sentences.chinese: 耐热盘

sentences.english: The menu includes a wide selection of vegetarian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 菜单上有品种丰富的素食。

detailed_translations.english: a flat container with low sides, for serving food from or cooking food in

name: factor
trans: A factor is a circumstance or influence that contributes to a result or outcome.

sentences.english: The rise in crime is mainly due to social and economic factors.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率上升主要由社会和经济因素造成。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因素， 因子； 系数
detailed_translations.english: one of several things that influence or cause a situation

name: fruit
trans: A fruit is the sweet and fleshy product of a tree or other plant that contains seeds.

sentences.english: Try to eat plenty of fresh fruit .
sentences.chinese: 尽量多吃新鲜水果。

sentences.english: fruit and vegetables
sentences.chinese: 水果和蔬菜

sentences.english: a glass of fruit juice
sentences.chinese: 一杯果汁

sentences.english: a large garden with fruit trees
sentences.chinese: 种了果树的大花园

sentences.english: I’m looking forward to retirement and having time to enjoy the fruits of my labour (= the results of my hard work ) .
sentences.chinese: 我盼望着退休，好有时间来享受自己的劳动成果。

detailed_translations.english: something that grows on a plant, tree, or bush, can be eaten as a food, contains seeds or a stone, and is usually sweet

name: glass
trans: Glass is a hard, transparent material used for windows, mirrors, and other purposes.

sentences.english: a glass bowl
sentences.chinese: 玻璃碗

sentences.english: a piece of broken glass
sentences.chinese: 一块碎玻璃片

sentences.english: the cathedral’s stained glass windows
sentences.chinese: 教堂的彩色玻璃窗

sentences.english: Nigel raised his glass in a toast to his son.
sentences.chinese: 奈杰尔举杯向儿子祝酒。

detailed_translations.english: a transparent solid substance used for making windows, bottles etc

name: joint
trans: A joint is the place where two or more bones meet in the body, or a place where two or more things are joined together.

sentences.english: The two ministers have issued a joint statement.
sentences.chinese: 两位部长发布了一项联合声明。

sentences.english: Both companies are involved in the joint development of a new medium-sized car.
sentences.chinese: 两家公司联合开发一款新的中型汽车。

sentences.english: The meal was a joint effort(= two or more people worked on it together ).
sentences.chinese: 这顿饭是大家一起做的。

sentences.english: Manchester United and Arsenal are joint favourites to win the title (= are thought to have the same chance of winning ).
sentences.chinese: 曼联和阿森纳均为夺冠的热门球队。

sentences.english: Both parties must sign the form if the account is to be in joint names(= belong to two named people ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这是联名账户的话，双方都必须在表格上签名。

detailed_translations.english: involving two or more people or groups, or owned or shared by them
a part of your body that can bend because two bones meet there

name: master
trans: A master is a person who has complete control or authority over something, or who has achieved a high level of skill or proficiency in a particular field.

sentences.english: a work of art by a true master
sentences.chinese: 一件真正的大师之作

sentences.english: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.chinese: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.english: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.chinese: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.english: Master of Arts/Science/Education etc
sentences.chinese: 文学/理学/教育学等硕士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is very skilled at something

name: muscle
trans: A muscle is a tissue in the body that can contract and produce movement.

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

name: red
trans: Red is a color that is the hue of blood, or a shade resembling it.

sentences.english: We painted the door bright red .
sentences.chinese: 我们把门漆成鲜红色。

sentences.english: a red balloon
sentences.chinese: 一个红气球

sentences.english: I like the way the artist uses red in this painting.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢画家在这幅作品中对红色的运用。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of blood
the colour of blood

name: strength
trans: Strength is the measure of how much force or power a person or thing has.

sentences.english: The police force is below strength at the moment (= there are fewer police than there should be ).
sentences.chinese: 目前警力不足。

sentences.english: the strength of a rope
sentences.chinese: 绳子的强度

detailed_translations.english: the number of people in a team, army etc

name: traffic
trans: Traffic refers to the movement of vehicles on a road, or the volume of people or goods moving through a particular place or system.

sentences.english: There wasn’t much traffic on the roads.
sentences.chinese: 路上车辆不多。

sentences.english: The sound of the traffic kept me awake.
sentences.chinese: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

detailed_translations.english: the vehicles moving along a road or street

name: trip
trans: A trip is a journey or excursion, usually for pleasure or vacation.
